Stage 3 [[/r 10d6 #poison]] poison damage and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused}(1 round)

entries.name: Blade of the Black Soverign
entries.description:
This +2 greater striking @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.NVst7e69agGG9Qwd]{Shock} greatsword is forged from standard-grade adamantine, with inlays of broken circuitry and a robot's ocular lens on the cross guard. A soft thrum comes from the blade, which you feel as a subtle pulse through the grip when wielding it. It sparks when unsheathed, emitting dim light within 5 feet.

On a hit against a foe made of metal, wearing metal armor, or using a metal shield, if the foe takes electricity damage from the blade, the makes the foe flat-footed for 1 round; if the Strike was a critical hit, it also makes them clumsy 1 for 1 round.

Activate 2 command, Interact

Effect You cast the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.kBhaPuzLUSwS6vVf]{Electric Arc} cantrip from the sword as an 8th-level primal spell, using 10 + your melee attack modifier with the Blade of the Black Sovereign as your spell DC.

entries.name: Blade of the Rabbit Prince
entries.description:
This +2 greater striking @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.DCPsilr8wbPXxTUv]{Dancing} shortsword has a golden handguard resembling a bird with outstretched wings. The sword's blade is broken halfway up its length, but this doesn't impair the sword's function.

Activate 1 command, Interact;

Effect You attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} an opponent using Thievery instead of Athletics, and you add the blade of the Rabbit Prince's item bonus to the check. You do not need to have a hand free if you're wielding the blade of the Rabbit Prince, and your target can be up to two sizes larger than you.

Craft Requirements You must craft the blade in the Harrowed Realm.

entries.name: Bladed Diabolo
entries.description: This weapon consists of two bladed discs joined by a central axel, and is spun on a rope whose ends are attached to wand-like sticks. The wielder can hurl the diabolo from the rope like a stone from a sling, or swing it on the rope in melee.

entries.name: Bladed Hoop
entries.description: This circular hoop has blades along its outer edge. You can wield it in two hands (using the two-hand damage) or by spinning it around an arm. While you spin the hoop, it gains the free-hand trait. Setting the hoop spinning takes 1 Interact action. In addition to the normal restrictions of the free-hand trait, extended use of the arm for locomotion (such as to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb}) interferes with the hoop's spinning and forces you to Release the hoop. You can't spin a hoop underwater. Keeping the hoop spinning requires a free action each round, which has the concentrate and manipulate traits. You can keep a hoop spinning as an exploration activity, but doing so for more than 10 minutes makes you fatigued, similarly to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.JuqmIAnkL9hVGai8]{Hustle}.

entries.name: Bladed Scarf
entries.description: The thin metal plates interwoven throughout this long scarf turn a fashion accessory into a deadly weapon.

entries.name: 血棘圈套
entries.description: When a creature enters the square, spines covered in numerous jagged thorns protrude out to stab it, dealing 8d8 piercing damage and 2d8 persistent bleed damage. The creature must attempt a DC 31 basic Reflex saving throw. After the initial trigger, the spines retract and protrude again repeatedly for 1 minute, forcing any creature that enters the space or ends its turn in the space to attempt a Reflex save against the spines' damage.

entries.name: Blessed Tattoo
entries.description:
Activate D envision, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You gain the effect of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gMODOGamz88rgHuf]{Protection} against evil.

You can activate the tattoo as a reaction instead of a two-action activity, triggered when a demon attacks you or you attempt a saving throw against a demon's ability.

entries.name: 枯萎炸弹 (高等)
entries.description:
Usage held in 1 hand

Activate A Strike

Blight bombs contain volatile toxic chemicals that rot flesh. A blight bomb deals 3d6 poison damage, 3d4 persistent poison damage, and 3 poison splash damage. You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls.

entries.name: 枯萎炸弹 (次等)
entries.description:
Usage held in 1 hand

Activate A Strike

Blight bombs contain volatile toxic chemicals that rot flesh. A blight bomb deals 1d6 poison damage, 1d4 persistent poison damage, and 1 poison splash damage.

entries.name: 枯萎炸弹 (上等)
entries.description:
Usage held in 1 hand

Activate A Strike

Blight bombs contain volatile toxic chemicals that rot flesh. A blight bomb deals 4d6 poison damage, 4d4 persistent poison damage, and 4 poison splash damage. You gain a +3 item bonus to attack rolls.

entries.name: 枯萎炸弹 (中等)
entries.description:
Usage held in 1 hand

Activate A Strike

Blight bombs contain volatile toxic chemicals that rot flesh. A blight bomb deals 2d6 poison damage, 2d4 persistent poison damage, and 2 poison splash damage. You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls.

entries.name: 燃疫松香
entries.description:
This tacky, hardened sap is harvested from trees infected by fungal blights and exposed to open flames.

Activate A Interact (Contact)

Saving Throw DC 31 Fortitude

Onset 1 minute

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r 8d6#poison]] poison damage (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r 10d6#poison]] poison damage (1 round)

Stage 3 [[/r 15d6#poison]] poison damage (1 round)

entries.name: Blightburn Ward
entries.description: This heavy iron necklace is decorated with tiny gems that resemble the stars in the ceiling high above the Vault of the Black Desert. While you have invested this item, you cannot contract blightburn sickness. It doesn't cure blightburn sickness if you already have it, but the disease's stage can't progress while you wear it.

entries.name: Blindpepper Bomb
entries.description:
Activate 1 Strike

Though expensive, these single-use alchemical bombs are often used by police forces to disperse unruly crowds and quell riots without risking permanent physical injury to either officers or civilians.

The bomb can be thrown up to 30 feet, causing it to explode, spraying the aerosolized pepper dust in a 15-foot-radius burst. All creatures in the area must succeed at a DC 18 Reflex save to avoid inhaling the dust or getting it in their eyes.

On a failed save, the creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round and then @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round.

On a critical failure, the creature is blinded for 1 round, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} 1, and dazzled until it removes the sickened condition.

entries.name: Blindpepper Tube
entries.description: This single-use pacification device consists of finely ground hot pepper loaded into a sealed, blowgun-style tube with a one-way valve and a range of 5 feet. To use it, the wielder must tear open the tube's seal as an Interact action, then spend another action to blow the hot pepper into an adjacent creature's face. These actions don't have to be taken in the same round. The target must attempt a DC 15 Reflex save to avoid inhaling the pepper or getting it in their eyes. On a failed save, the creature is blinded for 1 round and then dazzled for 1 round. On a critical failure, the creature is blinded for 1 round, sickened 1, and dazzled until it removes the sickened condition.

entries.name: Blood Sap
entries.description:
This potent drug is distilled from a certain tropical vine into a deep-red syrup that, over time, stains the user's lips and teeth a vivid shade of red.

Activate A Interact (Ingested)

Saving Throw DC 16 Fortitude

Onset 10 minutes

Maximum Duration 3 hours

Stage 1 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained} 1, +1 item bonus to weapon and unarmed attack rolls, Acrobatics checks, and Athletics checks (10 minutes)

Stage 2 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed} 1 (1 hour)

entries.name: Bloodbane
entries.description:
A bloodbane clan dagger is especially vicious against the ancestral enemies of the clan. When you damage an appropriate type of creature with the weapon, that creature takes 1 persistent bleed damage. The type of creature depends on the clan that made the dagger, but is typically drow, duergar, giant, or orc.

In addition, whenever you inflict persistent bleed damage with a bloodbane weapon (whether from its innate ability or in some other way), the weapon leaves ragged wounds. The bleeding creature must succeed at a DC 25 Fortitude save or become sickened 1. The creature is then temporarily immune for 1 hour.

entries.name: Bloodbane (高等)
entries.description:
A bloodbane clan dagger is especially vicious against the ancestral enemies of the clan. When you damage an appropriate type of creature with the weapon, that creature takes [[/r 1d4]] persistent bleed damage. The type of creature depends on the clan that made the dagger, but is typically drow, duergar, giant, or orc.

In addition, whenever you inflict persistent bleed damage with a bloodbane weapon (whether from its innate ability or in some other way), the weapon leaves ragged wounds. The bleeding creature must succeed at a DC 30 Fortitude save or become sickened 1. The creature is then temporarily immune for 1 hour.

entries.name: Bloodeye Coffee
entries.description:
A strong blend including several spices common in the Padishah Empire of Kelesh, bloodeye coffee is a favorite morning drink across the Inner Sea region. The maximum addiction stage of bloodeye coffee never progresses beyond stage 1.

Activate A Interact (Ingested)

Saving Throw DC 14 Fortitude

Onset 10 minutes

Maximum Duration 8 hours

Stage 1 +1 item bonus to AC and saves to which you are taking penalties caused by the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} condition (10 minutes)

Stage 2 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied} 1 (1 hour)

Stage 3 can't recover from fatigued (1 day, after which the drug ends)

entries.name: 猎犬面罩 (高等)
entries.description:
Activate 1 Interact

Duration 8 hours

This wide, single-use mask is designed to be slipped over your mouth and nose and its alchemical filter activated all with one hand. Once activated, the mask sharpens odors, giving you imprecise scent with a 60 foot range. You can't wear other masks while you're wearing a bloodhound mask.

When you use Survival to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{Track} a creature by its scent, your proficiency bonus is equal to your level even if you're untrained, and the mask grants you a +3 item bonus to your Survival check. The GM sets the Survival DC based on the area's ability to hold scent rather than on visual clues, as normal for using scent.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.MI5OCkF9IXmD2lPF]{Effect: Bloodhound Mask (Greater)}

entries.name: 猎犬面罩 (次等)
entries.description:
Activate 1 Interact

Duration 10 minutes

This wide, single-use mask is designed to be slipped over your mouth and nose and its alchemical filter activated all with one hand. Once activated, the mask sharpens odors, giving you imprecise scent with a 15 foot range. You can't wear other masks while you're wearing a bloodhound mask.

When you use Survival to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{Track} a creature by its scent, your proficiency bonus is equal to your level even if you're untrained, and the mask grants you a +1 item bonus to your Survival check. The GM sets the Survival DC based on the area's ability to hold scent rather than on visual clues, as normal for using scent.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.S4MZzALqFoXJsr6o]{Effect: Bloodhound Mask (Lesser)}

entries.name: 猎犬面罩 (中等)
entries.description:
Activate 1 Interact

Duration 1 hour

This wide, single-use mask is designed to be slipped over your mouth and nose and its alchemical filter activated all with one hand. Once activated, the mask sharpens odors, giving you imprecise scent a 30 foot range. You can't wear other masks while you're wearing a bloodhound mask.

When you use Survival to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{Track} a creature by its scent, your proficiency bonus is equal to your level even if you're untrained, and the mask grants you a +2 item bonus to your Survival check. The GM sets the Survival DC based on the area's ability to hold scent rather than on visual clues, as normal for using scent.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.wFF0SZs1Hcf87Kk1]{Effect: Bloodhound Mask (Moderate)}

entries.name: Bloodletting Kukri
entries.description: This +1 striking kukri has a crimson blade that shimmers eerily in bright light. On a critical hit, the kukri deals 1d8 persistent bleed damage. If the target didn't already have persistent bleed damage when you scored the critical hit, you also gain 1d8 temporary Hit Points.

entries.name: 觅血者之针 Bloodseeker beak
entries.description:
触发你用附着的武器击中了一个措手不及Flat-footed的生物

这根长长的空洞的针状吻是从声名狼藉的觅血者上摘下来的，而且仍然滴着血液。当你启动这根针鼻，你在伤害骰上造成额外1d4点精准伤害。如果你对一个生物造成偷袭伤害的话，你还会造成1d4点持续流血伤害。

entries.name: Blowgun
entries.description: This long, narrow tube is used for shooting blowgun darts, using only the power of a forcefully exhaled breath.

entries.name: Blowgun Darts
entries.description: These thin, light darts are typically made of hardwood and stabilized with fletching of down or fur. They are often hollow so they can be used to deliver poison.

entries.name: Blue Dragon's Breath Potion (Adult)
entries.description:
This liquid contains blood from a blue dragon. For 1 hour after you imbibe the concoction, you can unleash a blue dragon's breath weapon. The potency of the breath depends on the potion's type, based on the age of the dragon whose blood was used to make the potion.

Exhaling dragon breath uses a single action. You create a 30-foot line of electricity which deals [[/r 6d6]] electricity damage. All creatures in the area must attempt a DC 29 basic Reflex save.

After you use the breath weapon, you can't do so again for [[/r 1d4]] rounds.

entries.name: Blue Dragon's Breath Potion (Wyrm)
entries.description:
This liquid contains blood from a blue dragon. For 1 hour after you imbibe the concoction, you can unleash a blue dragon's breath weapon. The potency of the breath depends on the potion's type, based on the age of the dragon whose blood was used to make the potion.

Exhaling dragon breath uses a single action. You create a 30-foot line of electricity which deals [[/r 10d6]] electricity damage. All creatures in the area must attempt a DC 37 basic Reflex save.

After you use the breath weapon, you can't do so again for [[/r 1d4]] rounds.

entries.name: Blue Dragon's Breath Potion (Young)
entries.description:
This liquid contains blood from a blue dragon. For 1 hour after you imbibe the concoction, you can unleash a blue dragon's breath weapon. The potency of the breath depends on the potion's type, based on the age of the dragon whose blood was used to make the potion.

Exhaling dragon breath uses a single action. You create a 30-foot line of electricity which deals [[/r 4d6]] electricity damage. All creatures in the area must attempt a DC 23 basic Reflex save.

After you use the breath weapon, you can't do so again for [[/r 1d4]] rounds.

entries.name: Blue Dragonfly Poison
entries.description:
Boggards brew a potent toxin made from blue dragonflies. Swampseers consume this mixture to awaken their divine powers, but the poison inspires crippling hallucinations in most other creatures.

Activate A Interact (Ingested)

Saving Throw DC 17 Fortitude

Onset 10 minutes

Maximum Duration 30 minutes

Stage 1 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} (10 minutes)

Stage 2 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} 1 (10 minutes)

Stage 3 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} 1 and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} (1 minute)

entries.name: Blueblisters
entries.description:
This flesh-eating disease causes prominent and painful blue blisters on the skin and gums. You can’t reduce your sickened condition while afflicted with blueblisters.

Saving Throw DC 17 Fortitude;

Onset 1 day;

Stage 1 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened} 1 (1 day);

Stage 2 sickened 1 and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained} 1 (1 day);

Stage 3 sickened 2 and drained 1 (1 week);

Stage 4 sickened 2 and drained 2 (1 week)

entries.name: Bo Staff
entries.description: This strong but slender staff is tapered at the ends and well balanced. It's designed to be an offensive and defensive weapon.

entries.name: Boarding Pike
entries.description: Taking the form of a longspear fitted with crossbars or hooks, a boarding pike provides its wielder a sharp implement that's as adept at shoving enemies off a ship's railings as facilitating the boarding of other vessels. This is a martial melee weapon.

entries.name: Body Recovery Kit
entries.description:
This small silver tin is filled with a herb-infused salve and a shroud of fine silk fabric. The salve smells of lavender and hyssop and is waxy to the touch. The shroud, made of spun silk, can a hold a Medium or smaller creature.

If you apply the salve and shroud to a creature that died within the past 3 days, a process which normally takes 1 hour, it slows the decomposition process, allowing a creature to be brought back to life with @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IkGYwHRLhkuoGReG]{Raise Dead} up to 1 week after its death.

entries.name: Bola
entries.description: This throwing weapon consists of weights tied to the end of long cords, which can be used to bludgeon foes or entangle their legs.

entries.name: Bolts
entries.description: Shorter than traditional arrows but similar in construction, bolts are the ammunition used by crossbows.

entries.name: 炸弹圈套
entries.description:
You create a snare that catalyzes three 3rd-level moderate alchemical bombs of the same type to explode when a creature enters the snare's square. The target and all creatures in adjacent squares must attempt a DC 26 Reflex save, as the snare deals damage equal to three times the direct hit damage from one of the component bombs (for example, 6d6 electricity damage from bottled lightning) with no splash damage or other effects.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.
Success The creature takes half damage and no other effects.
Failure The creature takes full damage. It also takes all other effects of a direct hit from one of the component bombs (such as flat-footed from bottled lightning or persistent damage from an acid flask).
Critical Failure The creature takes double damage, plus all other effects of a direct hit (as failure).
Craft Requirements Supply six of the same damaging 3rd-level moderate alchemical bomb.

entries.name: 高等爆破者之眼灵药 Bomber's eye elixir (greater)
entries.description:
这瓶酊剂能让你精确定位敌人。在接下来的五分钟，你的炼金炸弹打击（Strikes）将会减少你的目标从掩蔽中获得的AC上的环境加值。

高等：目标的环境加值减少2。

entries.name: 次等爆破者之眼灵药 Bomber's eye elixir (lesser)
entries.description:
这瓶酊剂能让你精确定位敌人。在接下来的五分钟，你的炼金炸弹打击（Strikes）将会减少你的目标从掩蔽中获得的AC上的环境加值。

目标的环境加值减少1。

entries.name: Bomber's Saddle
entries.description:
Developed by urdefhans for their skaveling mounts but quickly copied by other races' cavalry, this leather saddle is made from cave worm hide and is designed to fit a variety of flying steeds. In addition to a seat for the rider, the bomber's saddle has a bomb compartment situated underneath the mount.

The compartment can hold up to six alchemical bombs of light or negligible Bulk.

Activate A Interact

Effect You drop a single item from the saddle's compartment, which falls to the ground below. If the item is a bomb, make a ranged Strike with it.

Activate D Interact

Requirements The saddle's compartment is loaded with two to six bombs

Effect You drop the saddle's entire payload, scattering the bombs below. Make a single ranged Strike against an AC of 10. The AC increases by 1 for every 5 feet above the target area you are.

On a failure, the bombs fly away wildly and deal no damage.

On a successful attack roll, the bombs fall and shatter, starting in the target area and moving in a line of 5-foot spaces up to 30 feet long for six bombs, one bomb per space. The bombs don't directly hit any creatures; instead, creatures take splash damage from the bombs as usual, but combine the splash damage from multiple overlapping bombs together before applying weaknesses or resistances. Apply any effects normally applied to splash damage when throwing a bomb (such as the effects of the Calculated Splash feat).

entries.name: Bookthief Brew
entries.description:
Activate 1 minute

This concoction mixes into a thick, paste-like substance when shaken. When exposed to air, the substance dries after one minute. If poured over a book, scroll, or other material featuring words written in ink, the brew will make an exact copy of the words it is in contact with while it dries, though it doesn't contain any magical effect or other special properties of the original words. Once dried, you can remove the dried substance as an Interact action. A single vial of bookthief brew can coat two pages from a book, a single scroll, or a similar amount of area for other surfaces, producing a dried sheet as thick as a piece of paper. Unfortunately, the sheet's copy is flipped, requiring a mirror to properly read.

entries.name: Boots of Bounding
entries.description:
The springy soles of these sturdy leather boots cushion your feet and make each step lighter. These boots give you a +5-foot item bonus to your Speed and a +2 item bonus to Athletics checks to High Jump and Long Jump.

In addition, when you use the Leap action, you can move 5 feet further if jumping horizontally or 3 feet higher if jumping vertically.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +5-foot item bonus to Speed
  • +2 item bonus to Athletics checks to High Jump and Long Jump

entries.name: Boots of Bounding (高等)
entries.description:
The springy soles of these sturdy leather boots cushion your feet and make each step lighter. These boots give you a +10-foot item bonus to your Speed and a +3 item bonus to Athletics checks to High Jump and Long Jump.

In addition, when you use the Leap action, you can move 5 feet further if jumping horizontally or 3 feet higher if jumping vertically.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +10-foot item bonus to Speed
  • +3 item bonus to Athletics checks to High Jump and Long Jump

entries.name: Boots of Dancing
entries.description: These boots act as greater boots of elvenkind, but they react wildly to strong physical exertion. While you wear the boots, the curse activates whenever you attempt an Athletics check or Stride more than once in a single round during an encounter. The boots cast an 8th-level uncontrollable dance spell on you, and you automatically fail your save. Once the curse has activated for the first time, the boots fuse to you.

entries.name: 精灵靴 Boots of elvenkind
entries.description:
这双高筒尖头靴是由柔软轻便的黑色或绿色皮革制成的，并装点着金边和金色带扣。穿戴时，这双靴子能够让你更加灵敏地移动，在特技Acrobatics检定上提供+1物品加值。

启动：[R]想象；频率：每小时一次

效果：在你这回合结束之前，你在地上移动时忽略困难地形。如果你同时穿戴精灵披风，你也能在陆地速度上获得+5尺状态加值，直到你的回合结束。

entries.name: 高等精灵靴 Boots of elvenkind (greater)
entries.description:
这双高筒尖头靴是由柔软轻便的黑色或绿色皮革制成的，并装点着金边和金色带扣。穿戴时，这双靴子能够让你更加灵敏地移动，在特技Acrobatics检定上提供+2物品加值。

启动：想象；频率：每小时一次

效果：在你这回合结束之前，你在地上移动时忽略困难地形。如果你同时穿戴精灵披风，你也能在陆地速度上获得+5尺状态加值，直到你的回合结束。

这双靴子提供+2加值。如果你同时穿戴精灵披风，高等精灵靴会在森林环境中持续性提供穿行无踪PassWithoutTrace的效果（DC30）。

entries.name: Boots of Speed
entries.description:
These sleek red boots make your legs feel like they're bursting with energy. You gain a +5-foot item bonus to your land Speed and to any climb or swim Speeds you have.

Activate A Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You click the heels of the boots together and gain the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} condition for 1 minute. You can use the extra action to Stride, Climb, or Swim. (You must still attempt an Athletics check for the Climb and Swim actions unless you have the appropriate movement type.)

Automatically applied effects:

  • +5-foot item bonus to your land Speed and to any climb or swim Speeds you have

entries.name: Bort's Blessing
entries.description:
This ornate copper band has a small ruby set in the center, flanked by a pair of dwarven runes. The wearer of this ring gains the ability to understand, read, and speak one common language of their choice, selected each morning as part of their daily preparations.

In addition, the wearer receives a +1 item bonus to Diplomacy checks to Make an Impression.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +1 item bonus to Diplomacy checks to Make an Impression.

entries.name: 瓶装空气 Bottled air
entries.description:
尽管看起来就像一只普通的带有软木塞的玻璃瓶，但是这个物品中却容纳着无穷无尽的新鲜空气。你必须先用一个交互动作打开瓶塞后才能启动这个瓶子。

启动：[A]交互

效果：你从瓶子里深吸一口气。这让你得以在没有空气或者有毒的环境中呼吸。空气不会从瓶口中逸出，所以把一个开口的瓶子放在真空环境中并不会对环境本身造成任何改变。

entries.name: 高等瓶装闪电 Bottled Lightning (greater)
entries.description:
瓶装闪电里面装满了一接触空气就会创造出强烈电流的不稳定液体试剂。瓶装闪电造成下面列出的闪电伤害和闪电溅射伤害。一旦命中，目标还会在你的下一回合开始前陷入措手不及（flat-footed）。许多种瓶装闪电会在攻击骰上给予物品加值。

高等：你在攻击骰上获得+2的物品加值。这枚炸弹造成3d6点闪电伤害和3点闪电溅射伤害。

entries.name: 次等瓶装闪电 Bottled Lightning (lesser)
entries.description:
瓶装闪电里面装满了一接触空气就会创造出强烈电流的不稳定液体试剂。瓶装闪电造成下面列出的闪电伤害和闪电溅射伤害。一旦命中，目标还会在你的下一回合开始前陷入措手不及（flat-footed）。许多种瓶装闪电会在攻击骰上给予物品加值。

次等：造成1d6点闪电伤害和1点闪电溅射伤害。

entries.name: 上等瓶装闪电 Bottled Lightning (major)
entries.description:
瓶装闪电里面装满了一接触空气就会创造出强烈电流的不稳定液体试剂。瓶装闪电造成下面列出的闪电伤害和闪电溅射伤害。一旦命中，目标还会在你的下一回合开始前陷入措手不及（flat-footed）。许多种瓶装闪电会在攻击骰上给予物品加值。

上等：你在攻击骰上获得+3的物品加值。这枚炸弹造成4d6点闪电伤害和4点闪电溅射伤害。

entries.name: 中等瓶装闪电 Bottled Lightning (moderate)
entries.description:
瓶装闪电里面装满了一接触空气就会创造出强烈电流的不稳定液体试剂。瓶装闪电造成下面列出的闪电伤害和闪电溅射伤害。一旦命中，目标还会在你的下一回合开始前陷入措手不及（flat-footed）。许多种瓶装闪电会在攻击骰上给予物品加值。

中等：你在攻击骰上获得+1的物品加值。这枚炸弹造成2d6点闪电伤害和2点闪电溅射伤害。

entries.name: Bottomless Stein
entries.description: A magic item regarded as holy by followers of Cayden Cailean, this ornate metallic stein is always filled to the brim with delicious ale, no matter how much is drunk or spilled. If it is emptied (such as by being gulped quickly or upended onto the floor), the bottomless stein will fill again within 1 round as long as it is right side up, though it's impossible to transfer the ale to another container to sell it or store it for later. The exact type of ale with which the stein is filled is determined at the item's creation, and cannot be changed thereafter.

entries.name: Boulderhead Bock
entries.description:
Activate A Interact

No one is sure if Gorm brews this malty ale himself, but it seems to be an off-duty favorite of the Grand Archive faction leader. The brew packs a heavy punch, and while Gorm officially discourages drinking on the job, boulderhead bock does makes the drinker more self-assured and protects them from conditions that would addle their mental faculties.

For 1 hour, you gain a +1 item bonus to saving throws against effects that would make you stunned or stupefied. However, you also become less aware of your surroundings, taking a -2 item penalty to Perception for 1 hour.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.2C1HuKDQDGFZuv7l]{Effect: Boulderhead Bock}

entries.name: Bountiful Cauldron
entries.description:
This mid-sized, silver cauldron is a boon within areas where access to fresh food is limited, for it can be commanded to fill itself with hearty (and delicious) vegetable stew. It can also be put to a much greater use in the pursuit of crafting certain items. When used to Craft alchemical items, potions, or oils, a bountiful cauldron grants a +2 item bonus to the Crafting check.

Activate T command, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You stir the cauldron, and it casts a 4th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Mt6ZzkVX8Q4xigFq]{Create Food} spell, filling itself with enough delicious vegetable stew to feed 12 Medium creatures.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +2 item bonus to the Crafting check for alchemical items

entries.name: Bracelets of Dashing
entries.description:
This jangling, silvery bracelet makes you lighter on your feet, giving you a +1 item bonus to Acrobatics checks.

Activate A command

Frequency once per day

Effect You gain a +10-foot status bonus to Speed for 1 minute.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.lLP56tbG689TNKW5]{Effect: Bracelets of Dashing}

Automatically applied effects:

  • +1 item bonus to Acrobatics checks.

entries.name: Bracers of Armor I
entries.description:
These stiff leather armguards grant you a +1 item bonus to AC and saving throws, and a maximum Dexterity modifier of +5. You can affix talismans to bracers of armor as though they were light armor.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +1 item bonus to AC and saving throws, and a maximum Dexterity modifier of +5.

entries.name: Bracers of Armor II
entries.description:
These stiff leather armguards grant you a +2 item bonus to AC and saving throws, and a maximum Dexterity modifier of +5. You can affix talismans to bracers of armor as though they were light armor.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +2 item bonus to AC and saving throws, and a maximum Dexterity modifier of +5.

entries.name: Bracers of Armor III
entries.description:
These stiff leather armguards grant you a +3 item bonus to AC and saving throws, and a maximum Dexterity modifier of +5. You can affix talismans to bracers of armor as though they were light armor.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +3 item bonus to AC and saving throws, and a maximum Dexterity modifier of +5.

entries.name: 飞弹偏斜护腕 Bracers of missile deflection
entries.description:
对护腕由耐用的秘银制成，并如夏日的太阳一般闪闪发光。

启动：交互；频率：每天一次；触发：一次远程武器攻击命中了你，但并没有达成重击；条件：你意识到了这次攻击，而且没有措手不及

效果：这对护腕偏斜了这次攻击的弹道。你在对抗触发的攻击的AC上获得+2环境加值。如果这会导致攻击失败，那么这次攻击丢失。

entries.name: 高等飞弹偏斜护腕 Bracers of missile deflection (greater)
entries.description:
对护腕由耐用的秘银制成，并如夏日的太阳一般闪闪发光。

启动：交互；频率：每天一次；触发：一次远程武器攻击命中了你，但并没有达成重击；条件：你意识到了这次攻击，而且没有措手不及

效果：这对护腕偏斜了这次攻击的弹道。你在对抗触发的攻击的AC上获得+2环境加值。如果这会导致攻击失败，那么这次攻击丢失。

高等：你可以每10分钟一次启动这对护腕。

entries.name: Brass Dragon's Breath Potion (Adult)
entries.description:
This liquid contains blood from a brass dragon. For 1 hour after you imbibe the concoction, you can unleash a brass dragon's breath weapon. The potency of the breath depends on the potion's type, based on the age of the dragon whose blood was used to make the potion.

Exhaling dragon breath uses a single action. You create a 30-foot line of fire which deals [[/r 6d6]] fire damage. All creatures in the area must attempt a DC 29 basic Reflex save.

After you use the breath weapon, you can't do so again for [[/r 1d4]] rounds.

entries.name: Brass Dragon's Breath Potion (Wyrm)
entries.description:
This liquid contains blood from a brass dragon. For 1 hour after you imbibe the concoction, you can unleash a brass dragon's breath weapon. The potency of the breath depends on the potion's type, based on the age of the dragon whose blood was used to make the potion.

Exhaling dragon breath uses a single action. You create a 30-foot line of fire which deals [[/r 10d6]] fire damage. All creatures in the area must attempt a DC 37 basic Reflex save.

After you use the breath weapon, you can't do so again for [[/r 1d4]] rounds.

entries.name: Brass Dragon's Breath Potion (Young)
entries.description:
This liquid contains blood from a brass dragon. For 1 hour after you imbibe the concoction, you can unleash a brass dragon's breath weapon. The potency of the breath depends on the potion's type, based on the age of the dragon whose blood was used to make the potion.

Exhaling dragon breath uses a single action. You create a 30-foot line of fire which deals [[/r 4d6]] fire damage. All creatures in the area must attempt a DC 23 basic Reflex save.

After you use the breath weapon, you can't do so again for [[/r 1d4]] rounds.

entries.name: Brass Ear
entries.description: A brass ear is a short, flared tube with one end narrow enough to comfortably fit against the ear canal. When using a brass ear to listen through a door, window, thin wall, or similar barrier, if the barrier would normally increase the DC of your Perception check to hear sounds on the other side, the DC increases by only half as much as normal.

entries.name: 狂徒醇酿 (高等)
entries.description:
Activate A Interact

This flask of foaming beer grants courage. For the next hour after drinking this elixir, you gain a +3 item bonus to Will saves, or +4 when attempting Will saves against fear. If you roll a success on a save against fear, you get a critical success instead.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.q1EhQ716bPSgJVnC]{Effect: Bravo's Brew (Greater)}

entries.name: 狂徒醇酿 Bravo's brew (lesser)
entries.description:
Activate A Interact

This flask of foaming beer grants courage. For the next hour after drinking this elixir, you gain a +1 item bonus to Will saves, or +2 when attempting Will saves against fear.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.eh7EqmDBDW30ShCu]{Effect: Bravo's Brew (Lesser)}

entries.name: 狂徒醇酿 (中等)
entries.description:
Activate A Interact

This flask of foaming beer grants courage. For the next hour after drinking this elixir, you gain a +2 item bonus to Will saves, or +3 when attempting Will saves against fear.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.wTZnKkT0K4Tdy8mD]{Effect: Bravo's Brew (Moderate)}

entries.name: Breastplate
entries.description: Though referred to as a breastplate, this type of armor consists of several pieces of plate or half‑plate armor (page 276) that protect the torso, chest, neck, and sometimes the hips and lower legs. It strategically grants some of the protection of plate while allowing greater flexibility and speed.

entries.name: Breastplate of Command
entries.description:
This +1 resilient breastplate is made from shining bronze overlaid with reinforcing golden panels in the shape of lion's heads. Wearing this breastplate grants you a commanding aura. You gain a +2 item bonus to Diplomacy checks, but you take a -2 item penalty to Stealth checks to Hide and Sneak and Deception checks to Impersonate.

ActivateACommand

Frequencyonce per day

EffectYou grant allies within 100 feet a +2 status bonus to saves against fear effects for 1 minute. When you activate this ability, each affected ally who's frightened reduces their frightened value by 1.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.G0lG7IIZnCZtYi6v]{Effect: Breastplate of Command}

Automatically applied effects:

  • +2 item bonus to Diplomacy checks
  • -2 item penalty to Stealth checks to Hide and Sneak
  • -2 item penalty to Deception checks to Impersonate

entries.name: Breastplate of Command (高等)
entries.description:
This +2 greater resilient breastplate is made from shining bronze overlaid with reinforcing golden panels in the shape of lion's heads. Wearing this breastplate grants you a commanding aura. You gain a +3 item bonus to Diplomacy checks, but you take a -3 item penalty to Stealth checks to Hide and Sneak and Deception checks to Impersonate.

ActivateACommand

Frequencyonce per day

EffectYou grant allies within 100 feet a +2 status bonus to saves against fear effects for 1 minute. When you activate this ability, each affected ally who's frightened reduces their frightened value by 1.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.G0lG7IIZnCZtYi6v]{Effect: Breastplate of Command}

Automatically applied effects:

  • +3 item bonus to Diplomacy checks
  • -3 item penalty to Stealth checks to Hide and Sneak
  • -3 item penalty to Deception checks to Impersonate

entries.name: 硫磺烟
entries.description:
Fumes from the forges of Hell drain health and strength alike.

Activate A Interact (Inhaled)

Saving Throw DC 36 Fortitude

Onset 1 round

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r 7d6#poison]] poison damage and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} 1 (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r 8d6#poison]] poison damage and enfeebled 2 (1 round)

Stage 3 [[/r 10d6#poison]] poison damage and enfeebled 3 (1 round)

entries.name: 青铜牛垂饰 Bronze bull pendant
entries.description:
触发你尝试一次运动Atheltics检定以进行推撞Shove，但你尚未投掷结果；需求你在运动Athletics中受训

这条垂饰用粗糙的钢铁制成，上面描绘了一个愤怒公牛的脸。这条垂饰必须附着在胸甲或肩甲处。当你启动这条垂饰，你在用来推撞Shove的运动Athletics检定中获得+2状态加值，另外如果你在检定中投出了大失败，用失败来替代。

entries.name: Bronze Dragon's Breath Potion (Adult)
entries.description:
This liquid contains blood from a bronze dragon. For 1 hour after you imbibe the concoction, you can unleash a bronze dragon's breath weapon. The potency of the breath depends on the potion's type, based on the age of the dragon whose blood was used to make the potion.

Exhaling dragon breath uses a single action. You create a 30-foot line of electricity which deals [[/r 6d6]] electricity damage. All creatures in the area must attempt a DC 29 basic Reflex save.

After you use the breath weapon, you can't do so again for [[/r 1d4]] rounds.

entries.name: Bronze Dragon's Breath Potion (Wyrm)
entries.description:
This liquid contains blood from a bronze dragon. For 1 hour after you imbibe the concoction, you can unleash a bronze dragon's breath weapon. The potency of the breath depends on the potion's type, based on the age of the dragon whose blood was used to make the potion.

Exhaling dragon breath uses a single action. You create a 30-foot line of electricity which deals [[/r 10d6]] electricity damage. All creatures in the area must attempt a DC 37 basic Reflex save.

After you use the breath weapon, you can't do so again for [[/r 1d4]] rounds.

entries.name: Bronze Dragon's Breath Potion (Young)
entries.description:
This liquid contains blood from a bronze dragon. For 1 hour after you imbibe the concoction, you can unleash a bronze dragon's breath weapon. The potency of the breath depends on the potion's type, based on the age of the dragon whose blood was used to make the potion.

Exhaling dragon breath uses a single action. You create a 30-foot line of electricity which deals [[/r 4d6]] electricity damage. All creatures in the area must attempt a DC 23 basic Reflex save.

After you use the breath weapon, you can't do so again for [[/r 1d4]] rounds.

entries.name: Brooch of Shielding
entries.description:
This piece of silver or gold jewelry is adorned with miniature images of kite shields and can be used to fasten a cloak or cape.

The brooch automatically absorbs magic missile spells targeting you. A brooch of shielding can absorb 30 individual magic missiles before it melts and becomes useless. Sometimes when found, a brooch of shielding has already absorbed a number of missiles.

entries.name: 飞行扫帚 Broom of flying
entries.description:
这把扫帚于重力间有着一股微弱的联系，以至于即使被收起时也会漂浮起来。你可以用一只手控制扫帚而让自己骑在上面，并且除你之外这把扫帚还能再搭载一名乘客。这把扫帚能够以20英尺的飞行速度移动。扫帚的运力是有限的，携带了超过20负载时它的移动速度会承受-10英尺的罚值，携带了超过30负载时它则会一头栽到地上。

启动：[AA]命令，交互

效果：你说出一个位于同位面的目的地，扫帚就会以40英尺的飞行速度朝着你说的方向前进。你必须用两只手抓住扫帚才能让自己骑在上面，要么你就只能撒手让扫帚自个儿过去。如果你对目的地的位置、布局或是大致方向都不甚明了，或者你说的目的地在另一个位面上，那么扫帚只会漫无目的得四处游荡，并且在30分钟后返回起始位置。

如果扫帚携带着一名骑手，那么这个启动效果会在4小时后（通常情况下已经跑了16英里）、或是扫帚到达了目的地、或是你解消启动后结束。如果扫帚上没有骑手，那么这个启动效果会持续到扫帚到达目的地。当启动效果结束后，扫帚将会漂浮在地上，并且在1小时之内都无法被在此启动。

entries.name: Buckler
entries.description:
This very small shield is a favorite of duelists and quick, lightly armored warriors. It's typically made of steel and strapped to your forearm. You can Raise a Shield with your buckler as long as you have that hand free or are holding a light object that's not a weapon in that hand.

Hardness HP BT
3 6 3

entries.name: Bullhook
entries.description:
A bullhook is a stout rod about 4 feet long with a blunt hook on the end. Too dull to be useful as a weapon, a bullhook is instead used to direct animals in training or in performing their tasks. A bullhook grants you a +2 item bonus to Nature checks to Command an Animal while you are holding it.

Activate D command, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You wave the bullhook to produce the effects of a first level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.aIHY2DArKFweIrpf]{Command} spell (DC 18). This spell loses the linguistic trait and can target only animals.

Craft Requirements Supply a casting of command of the appropriate level.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +2 item bonus to Nature checks to Command an Animal

entries.name: Bullhook (高等)
entries.description:
A bullhook is a stout rod about 4 feet long with a blunt hook on the end. Too dull to be useful as a weapon, a bullhook is instead used to direct animals in training or in performing their tasks. A bullhook grants you a +2 item bonus to Nature checks to Command an Animal while you are holding it.

Activate D command, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You wave the bullhook to produce the effects of a fifth level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.aIHY2DArKFweIrpf]{Command} spell (DC 30). This spell loses the linguistic trait and can target only animals.

Craft Requirements Supply a casting of command of the appropriate level.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +2 item bonus to Nature checks to Command an Animal

entries.name: Buoyancy Vest
entries.description:
This canvas vest has been filled with cork shavings, tightly folded, and sewn shut. Wearing a buoyancy vest allows you to float in water with a lowered risk of sinking. If you end your turn in water while wearing a buoyancy vest and haven't succeeded at a Swim action that turn, attempt a DC 5 flat check.

On a success, you do not sink, though you can still get moved by the current, as determined by the GM. The GM can also determine whether the vest is more or less effective in different weather conditions, raising the DC in rough waters or lowering the DC in calm water.

entries.name: 铁蒺藜圈套 Caltrop snare
entries.description:
This snare consists of a hidden canister of caltrops attached to a trip wire. When the snare is triggered, it flings the caltrops into either the snare's square or a square adjacent to the snare. You choose which square when you set up the snare.

If the caltrops scatter into the same square as a creature, that creature must attempt the Acrobatics check immediately.

Craft Requirements Supply a container of caltrops.

entries.name: Caltrops
entries.description: These four‑pronged metal spikes can cause damage to a creature's feet. You can scatter caltrops in an empty square adjacent to you with an Interact action. The first creature that moves into that square must succeed at a DC 14 Acrobatics check or take 1d4 piercing damage and 1 persistent bleed damage. A creature taking persistent bleed damage from caltrops takes a -5‑foot penalty to its Speed. Spending an Interact action to pluck the caltrops free reduces the DC to stop the bleeding. Once a creature takes damage from caltrops, enough caltrops are ruined that other creatures moving into the square are safe. Deployed caltrops can be salvaged and reused if no creatures took damage from them. Otherwise, enough caltrops are ruined that they can't be salvaged.

entries.name: Candle
entries.description: A lit candle sheds dim light in a 10‑foot radius.

entries.name: Candle of Invocation
entries.description:
Activate 1 Interact

This golden candle bears the symbol of a specific deity emblazoned on its surface, surrounded by the iconography of that deity's faith. Once lit, this candle burns for 1 hour, and it can't be extinguished.

Characters who cast divine spells and worship the deity emblazoned on the candle can perform their daily preparations within 10 feet of the lit candle to gain two additional spell slots for the day, each at half the highest spell level the character can cast (for example, 4th level slots if the caster can cast 8th-level spells). Prepared casters must prepare spells in these spell slots as they do for all their other spell slots.

A caster's additional spell slots from the candle are lost the next time that caster performs their daily preparations. No one can benefit from more than one candle of invocation in a day, but multiple characters can benefit from a single candle's effects.

entries.name: Candle of Revealing
entries.description:
Activate 1 Interact

When lit, this black candle's eerie blue flame reveals the presence of invisible creatures. Within a 10-foot radius of the lit candle, creatures don't benefit from the invisible condition. Their bodies are outlined, not fully visible, so they are concealed. Once lit, the candle burns for 1 minute, after which the effect ends. If extinguished, it can't be relit.

entries.name: Candle of Truth
entries.description:
Activate A Interact

This tapered candle has a golden wick that burns with white fire. You activate the candle by lighting it, which causes creatures within 10 feet of the candle to find it difficult to tell falsehoods. Creatures in the area receive a -4 status penalty to Lie.

In addition, when first entering the affected area, each creature (including you) must succeed at a DC 26 Will save or be unable to tell any deliberate lies while within 10 feet of the lit candle. This lasts for as long as the candle is lit. Once lit, the candle burns for 10 minutes, and it cannot be extinguished.

entries.name: Cape of the Mountebank
entries.description:
This bright red-and-gold cape is often interlaced with glittery threads and serves as a distraction. While wearing the cape, you gain a +2 item bonus to Deception checks.

Activate D Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.VlNcjmYyu95vOUe8]{Dimension Door}. The space you leave and the one you appear in are filled with puffs of smoke that make anyone within concealed until they leave the smoke or the end of your next turn, at which point the smoke dissipates. Strong winds immediately disperse the smoke.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +2 item bonus to Deception checks

entries.name: Capsaicin Tonic
entries.description:
This translucent, pale-yellow drink has several pepper seeds suspended within it. Although the tonic is painfully spicy when first consumed, the heat soon fades as the tonic coats your throat. In the next hour, you can use the activation below up to three times; the third time you use it, the effects of the capsaicin tonic end. While under the effects of the tonic, you can easily consume even the spiciest of foods without trouble.

Activate A Interact

Effect You belch out a foul-smelling cloud of blisteringly spicy gas that fills a single square adjacent to you. Creatures within the cloud are concealed, and all creatures outside the cloud are concealed to creatures within it. The cloud remains for 1 minute but can be dispersed by a strong wind. The cloud deals 1d4 fire damage to creatures that enter the cloud on their turn, as well as to creatures that start their turn in the cloud (a creature takes this damage no more than once per round, even if it moves back and forth into the cloud multiple times during the round).

entries.name: Cartographer's Kit
entries.description: This kit includes a writing set, a compass, a standard astrolabe, a ruler, and a survey map.

entries.name: Cassock of Devotion
entries.description:
Each cassock of devotion depicts scenes related to the domains of a certain deity. It serves as a religious symbol of that deity, and it doesn't need to be wielded to provide that benefit. You gain a +2 item bonus to Religion checks and a +1 item bonus to the divine skill of the deity to whom the cassock is dedicated.

Activate F envision

Frequency once per day

Effect You gain 1 Focus Point, which you can spend only to cast a cleric domain spell for a domain belonging to the deity the cassock is dedicated to. If you don't spend this Focus Point by the end of this turn, it is lost.

Craft Requirements You are a cleric who worships the deity tied to the cassock.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +2 item bonus to Religion checks

entries.name: 猫眼灵药 Cat's eye elixir
entries.description:
Activate A Interact

After you consume this elixir, your vision sharpens and you become sensitive to even the most minute movements.

For the next minute, you reduce the flat check to target hidden creatures to 5, and you don't need to attempt a flat check to target concealed creatures. These benefits apply only against creatures within 30 feet of you.

entries.name: 尖叫投石索 Caterwaul sling
entries.description:
以光泽明亮的棕皮制作，这件+1强击投石索用一根白色的线将皮革穿起来。

启动：[[AA]]交互（音波）；频率：每天一次；

效果：你空挥白线，将投石索回旋甩至最高速度。它会发出一股刺耳的尖叫，30尺锥形内所有生物受到4d6点音波伤害（DC21基础强韧豁免）。所有豁免失败的生物耳聋1轮，大失败则耳聋1小时。

entries.name: Caustic Deteriorating Dust
entries.description:
Contained in a specially enchanted small leather or hide sack, deteriorating dust is a potent caustic agent and a prized item among Rovagug's more discreet followers.

Activate D Interact

Effect You sprinkle the deteriorating dust over an unattended Medium or smaller object. The dust quickly fades to a transparent color and the object immediately begins to rust, melt, or otherwise fall apart. For the listed time, the object takes constant damage; if the object has a Hardness, then the dust gradually reduces the object's Hardness instead. If the deteriorating dust is still active after the object's Hardness is reduced to 0, it deals damage to the object as previously described. If the object survives, reduced Hardness returns after the dust's duration expires, but any damage remains.

The affected object takes 1 damage per hour (24 damage per day) and its Hardness is reduced by 1 per hour. The effect lasts for 3 days.

entries.name: Celestial Armor
entries.description:
This suit of +2 resilient chain mail is made of fine white links of a strange and slightly translucent pale metal, and the sleeves and skirt are fashioned into smaller trails that resemble feathers. Unlike normal chain mail, celestial armor has no Speed reduction, its armor check penalty is 0, and its Bulk is 1.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and saving throws against fiends. You appear radiant while you wear the armor, giving you a +2 item bonus to Diplomacy checks against all creatures except fiends.

If you are not good, you are drained 2 while wearing celestial armor. You can't recover from this condition while wearing the armor.

Activate command

Frequency once per day

Effect The armor sprouts glowing wings that grant you a fly Speed of 30 feet. The wings shed bright light in a 40-foot radius (and dim light to the next 40 feet). The wings fade away after 10 minutes.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.gDefAEEMXVVZgqXH]{Effect: Celestial Armor}

Craft Requirements You are good.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +1 circumstance bonus to AC and saving throws against fiends.
  • +2 item bonus to Diplomacy checks against all creatures except fiends.

entries.name: Celestial Hair
entries.description:
Activate F Interact

Trigger You critically fail a saving throw or are critically hit by an attack

This strand of hair shimmers like the strands of fate. When you activate the string, it resonates with a single, perfect note.

The triggering saving throw becomes a failure or the triggering attack roll becomes a regular hit, not critical one. If the source of the attack or effect is an evil creature, that creature must succeed at a DC 41 Will saving throw or be enfeebled 2 and stupefied 2 until the end of its next turn.

entries.name: Celestial Peach (Life)
entries.description:
Activate 1 Interact

Among Hao Jin's most precious treasures are three living plants, the last surviving celestial peach trees taken from the mountains of Chu Ye. One of the trees grows pearls in place of flowers, but the other two bear fruit that is far more valuable. Eating one of these small red peaches can heal even the most grievous of injuries.

When you place the peach into the mouth of an intact corpse that died within the last year, it casts a 10th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IkGYwHRLhkuoGReG]{Raise Dead} on the corpse.

entries.name: Celestial Peach (Rejuvination)
entries.description:
Activate 1 Interact

Among Hao Jin's most precious treasures are three living plants, the last surviving celestial peach trees taken from the mountains of Chu Ye. One of the trees grows pearls in place of flowers, but the other two bear fruit that is far more valuable. Eating one of these small red peaches can heal even the most grievous of injuries.

You gain the effects of 7th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.SUKaxVZW2TlM8lu0]{Neutralize Poison}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.2Vkd1IxylPceUAAF]{Regenerate}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.OyFCwQuw8XRazsNr]{Remove Curse}, and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.RneiyehRO6f7LP44]{Remove Disease} spells. The peach has a counteract modifier of [[/r 1d20+27]].

entries.name: 蔚蓝灾厄
entries.description:
Made from a carefully distilled blend of serpentine hemotoxins, the fast-acting cerulean scourge is infamous for transforming the blood vessels near the original wound, which glow with a bright blue light before painfully bursting.

Activate 2 Interact (Injuury)

Saving Throw DC 36 Fortitude

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r 9d6 #poison]] poison damage (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r 12d6 #poison]] poison damage (1 round)

Stage 3 [[/r 15d6 #poison]] poison damage (1 round)

entries.name: Chain (10 feet)
entries.description: 10 feet of chain.

entries.name: Chain Mail
entries.description: A suit of chain mail consists of several pieces of armor composed of small metal rings linked together in a protective mesh. It typically includes a chain shirt, leggings, a pair of arms, and a coif, collectively protecting most of the body.

entries.name: Chain of the Stilled Spirit
entries.description: This 3-foot length of chain is made of a mystical blue-white steel. You can wrap the chain around an item or creature; if a ghost of 9th level or lower is bound to the item or creature via its rejuvenation ability, it cannot rejuvenate if it is destroyed. This chain can't impede a ghost's rejuvenation that is tied to an area, only to an item or creature. At the GM's discretion, thechain of the stilled spiritmight work on abilities similar to Rejuvenation that prevent a spirit from going being fully destroyed.

entries.name: Chain Shirt
entries.description: Sometimes called a hauberk, this is a long shirt constructed of the same metal rings as chainmail. However, it is much lighter than chainmail and protects only the torso, upper arms, and upper legs of its wearer.

entries.name: Channel Protection Amulet
entries.description: This nugget of polished tektite is trapped in a cage of braided wire and hangs from a silken cord. When wearing this amulet, you gain resistance 5 against damage from harm spells if you're living, or against heal spells if you're undead.

entries.name: 高等猎豹灵药 Cheetah's elixir (greater)
entries.description:
这瓶灵药中的混合酶能够刺激并增强你的腿部肌肉。你在如下所述的持续时间内于你的速度（Speed）上获得状态（status）加值。

类型高等；等级9；价格110gp

加值为+10尺，持续时间为1小时。

entries.name: 次等猎豹灵药 Cheetah's elixir (lesser)
entries.description:
这瓶灵药中的混合酶能够刺激并增强你的腿部肌肉。你在如下所述的持续时间内于你的速度（Speed）上获得状态（status）加值。

次等：加值为+5尺，持续时间为1分钟。

entries.name: 中等猎豹灵药 Cheetah's elixir (moderate)
entries.description:
这瓶灵药中的混合酶能够刺激并增强你的腿部肌肉。你在如下所述的持续时间内于你的速度（Speed）上获得状态（status）加值。

类型中等；等级5；价格25gp

加值为+10尺，持续时间为10分钟。

entries.name: Chest
entries.description: A wooden chest can hold up to 8 Bulk of items.

entries.name: Chime of Opening
entries.description:
This hollow mithral tube is about a foot long and bears engravings reminiscent of open locks and broken chains. The chime can be activated 10 times before it cracks and becomes useless.

Activate A Interact

Effect You aim the chime at a container, door, or lock you want to open and strike the chime. The chime sends out magical vibrations that attempt a Thievery check against the lock's DC, with a Thievery bonus of [[/r 1d20+13]]. This targets only one lock or binding at a time, so you might need to activate the chime multiple times to open a target with several forms of protection.

entries.name: 雄辩颈圈 Choker of elocution
entries.description: 这只白金颈圈上刻着一种语言的字母表，能提供一种语言以及相关文化的知识。你在社群Society检定上获得+1物品加值，并能够理解、说和写这种语言。你精彩的雄辩能力能够将在耳聋Deafened状态下执行一次听觉Auditory动作的纯骰检定DC从5降低至3。

entries.name: 高等雄辩颈圈 Choker of elocution (greater)
entries.description:
这只白金颈圈上刻着3种语言的字母表，能提供3种语言以及相关文化的知识。你在社群Society检定上获得+2物品加值，并能够理解、说和写这种语言。你精彩的雄辩能力能够将在耳聋Deafened状态下执行一次听觉Auditory动作的纯骰检定DC从5降低至3。

高等：物品加值为+2。颈圈能够提供3种语言。

entries.name: Chronicler Wayfinder
entries.description:
Chronicler wayfinders bear a mystical connection to the Pathfinder Chronicles themselves, granting them the ability to assist in situations where unusual lore is needed by drawing on lore from a particular topic. Each chronicler wayfinder is attuned to a specific Lore skill, chosen at the time of creation. In addition to the effects of a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.gbwr57aT9ou8yKWT]{Wayfinder}, a chronicler wayfinder has the following activation.

Activate A Envision

Effect You tap into the Pathfinder Chronicles on the chronicler wayfinder's attuned topic, gaining the effects of a Recall Knowledge action with the chosen Lore skill. For the Lore check's modifier, use whichever is better of +12 or your own modifier, using your level as your proficiency bonus even if you're untrained in the attuned Lore skill.

entries.id: Chrysoberyl symbol of an evil eye
entries.name: Chrysoberyl symbol of an evil eye
Cinderclaw Gauntlet
entries.description:
This sharp-taloned +1 striking spiked gauntlet appears to have been crafted from dragon scales, with claws built from iron. In addition to the typical weapon traits, a Cinderclaw gauntlet has the versatile S trait.

On a critical hit, the Cinderclaw gauntlet deals an additional 1d6 fire damage.

Activate R command

Trigger Your attack roll with the Cinderclaw gauntlet is a critical success.

Effect The creature you hit must succeed at a DC 19 Fortitude save or be sickened 1 by the gauntlet's acrid smoke. Creatures that don't need to breathe are immune.

entries.name: Circlet of Persuasion
entries.description:
This elegant silver band often resembles curling fig leaves and fits around your brow. You gain a +2 item bonus to Deception and Diplomacy checks. When you invest the circlet, you either increase your Charisma score by 2 or increase it to 18, whichever would give you a higher score.

Activate D envision

Frequency once per hour

Effect You cast a 4th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vLA0q0WOK2YPuJs6]{Charm} spell (DC 38).

Automatically applied effects:

  • +2 item bonus to Diplomacy checks
  • +2 item bonus to Deception checks

entries.name: Clan Dagger
entries.description: This broad dagger is carried by dwarves as a weapon, tool, and designation of clan. Losing or having to surrender a clan dagger is considered a mark of embarrassment to most dwarves.

entries.name: Clandestine Cloak
entries.description:
When you pull up the hood of this nondescript gray cloak (an Interact action), you become drab and uninteresting, gaining a +1 item bonus to Stealth checks and to Deception checks to Impersonate a forgettable background character, such as a servant, but also taking a -1 item penalty to Diplomacy and Intimidation checks.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.Uadsb25G18pKdZ2e]{Effect: Clandestine Cloak}

Activate D envision, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You pull the cloak's hood up and gain the benefits of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.EoKBlgf6Smt8opaU]{Nondetection} for 1 hour or until you pull the hood back down, whichever comes first.

entries.name: Clandestine Cloak (高等)
entries.description:
When you pull up the hood of this nondescript gray cloak (an Interact action), you become drab and uninteresting, gaining a +2 item bonus to Stealth checks and to Deception checks to Impersonate a forgettable background character, such as a servant, but also taking a -1 item penalty to Diplomacy and Intimidation checks.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.uXEp1rPU5fY4OiBf]{Effect: Clandestine Cloak (Greater)}

Activate D envision, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You pull the cloak's hood up and gain the benefits of a 5th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.EoKBlgf6Smt8opaU]{Nondetection} for 8 hours or until you pull the hood back down, whichever comes first.

entries.name: Class Kit (Alchemist)
entries.description:
Armor studded leather armor
Weapons dagger, sling with 20 sling bullets
Gear adventurer's pack, alchemist's tools, basic
crafter's book, 2 sets of caltrops
Options @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.vLGDUFrg4yGzpTQX]{Repair Kit} (2 gp)

entries.name: Class Kit (Barbarian)
entries.description:
Armor hide armor
Weapons 4 javelins
Gear adventurer's pack, grappling hook
Options @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.8COlYvHe6hKCXY8x]{greataxe} (2 gp), @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.kdGqnqbrwPzQfTsm]{greatclub} (1 gp), @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.UX71GkWBL9g41VwM]{greatsword} (2 gp), or @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.War0uyLBx1jA0Ge7]{battle axe} and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Yr9yCuJiAlFh3QEB]{steel shield} (3 gp)

entries.name: Class Kit (Bard)
entries.description:
Armor studded leather armor
Weapons dagger, rapier, sling with 20 sling bullets
Gear adventurer's pack, handheld instrument

entries.name: Class Kit (Champion)
entries.description:
Armor hide armor
Weapons dagger, 4 javelins
Gear adventurer's pack, crowbar, grappling hook
Options @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Yr9yCuJiAlFh3QEB]{Steel Shield} (2 gp), your deity's favored weapon (see the deity entries on pages 437-441; use the Price listed in this chapter)

entries.name: Class Kit (Cleric)
entries.description:
Gear adventurer's pack, 2 sets of caltrops, religious symbol (wooden)
Options your deity's favored weapon (see the deity entries on pages 437-441; use the Price listed in this chapter), @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.AnwzlOs0njF9Jqnr]{hide armor} (2 gp)

entries.name: Class Kit (Druid)
entries.description:
Armor leather armor
Weapons 4 javelins, longspear
Gear adventurer's pack, holly and mistletoe
Options @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.s1vB3HdXjMigYAnY]{healer's tools} (5 gp)

entries.name: Class Kit (Fighter)
entries.description:
Armor hide armor
Weapons dagger
Gear adventurer's pack, grappling hook
Options @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.UX71GkWBL9g41VwM]{Greatsword} (2 gp), @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.MVAWttmT0QDa7LsV]{Longbow} with 20 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.w2ENw2VMPcsbif8g]{Arrows} (6 gp, 2 sp), or @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.LJdbVTOZog39EEbi]{Longsword} and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Yr9yCuJiAlFh3QEB]{Steel Shield} (3 gp)

entries.name: Class Kit (Investigator)
entries.description:
Armor studded leather armor
Weapons sap, shortsword, crossbow with 20 bolts
Gear adventurer's pack, crowbar
Options @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.4ftXXUCBHcf4b0MH]{Alchemist's Tools} (3 gp), @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.ckGYDocGEaelHfXF]{Manacles (Simple)} (3 gp), @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.QJb8S927Yj81EgHH]{Writing Set} (1 gp)

entries.name: Class Kit (Monk)
entries.description:
Weapons 10 darts
Gear adventurer's pack, climbing kit, grappling hook, lesser smokestick

Options @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.FVjTuBCIefAgloUU]{Staff} (0 gp), @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.aXuJh4i8HqSu6NYV]{Longspear} (5 sp)

entries.name: Class Kit (Oracle)
entries.description:
Armor studded leather armor
Weapons mace, sling with 20 sling bullets
Gear adventurer's pack
Options @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Yr9yCuJiAlFh3QEB]{Steel Shield} (2 gp), @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.s1vB3HdXjMigYAnY]{Healer's Tools} (5 gp)

entries.name: Class Kit (Ranger)
entries.description:
Armor leather armor
Weapons dagger
Gear adventurer's pack
Options @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.MVAWttmT0QDa7LsV]{longbow} with 20 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.w2ENw2VMPcsbif8g]{arrows} (6 gp, 2 sp), @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.LJdbVTOZog39EEbi]{longsword} and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Yr9yCuJiAlFh3QEB]{steel shield} (3 gp), 2 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.7tKkkF8eZ4iCLJtp]{shortswords} (1 gp, 8 sp), @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.h7gsRKv6rORYgsv0]{snare kit} (5 gp)

entries.name: Class Kit (Rogue)
entries.description:
Armor leather armor
Weapons dagger, rapier
Gear adventurer's pack, climbing kit
Options @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.zvLyCVD8g2PdHJAc]{thieves' tools} (3 gp)

entries.name: Class Kit (Sorcerer)
entries.description:
Weapons dagger, sling with 20 sling bullets
Gear adventurer's pack, 2 sets of caltrops

entries.name: Class Kit (Swashbuckler)
entries.description:
Armor leather armor
Weapons hand crossbow with 20 bolts, rapier
Gear adventurer's pack
Options @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.1k3AsSW7lpU0kEpY]{Buckler} (1 gp), @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.DA3HgyEBGEbtRNOo]{Dueling Cape} (5 sp), @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.jJZbdMHMdh8UL2j8]{Clothing (Fine)} (2 gp), @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.6DCy7tEF1cxaIJMy]{Grappling Hook} (1 sp), @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.iWcw1sFLAzByVLBP]{Main-Gauche} (5 sp)

entries.name: Class Kit (Witch)
entries.description:
Weapons sickle, sling with 20 bullets, staff
Gear adventurer's pack, explorer's clothing, material component pouch
Options @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Yf7maiRDmmHAyF82]{Cookware} (1 gp), @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.s1vB3HdXjMigYAnY]{Healer's Tools} (5 gp)

entries.name: Class Kit (Wizard)
entries.description:
Weapons staff
Gear adventurer's pack, material component pouch, writing set
Options @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.62nnVQvGhoVLLl2K]{crossbow} with 20 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.AITVZmakiu3RgfKo]{bolts} (3 gp, 2 sp)

entries.name: Claw Blade
entries.description: The three parallel blades of this handheld weapon extend between the fingers to resemble the natural claws of the amurruns who created them, providing a way for those catfolk without suitable natural claws to share the fighting customs of their kin.

entries.name: 攀爬矢 Climbing bolt
entries.description: 这支矢的杆部卷着细绳，当这支矢击中了固体表面，细绳会解开成50尺长的绳子，稳固地系在弩矢撞击的表面上。通过一个交互Interact动作和一个DC20的运动Athletics检定，可以将绳子取下来。

entries.name: Climbing Kit
entries.description: This satchel includes 50 feet of rope, pulleys, a dozen pitons, a hammer, a grappling hook, and one set of crampons. Climbing kits allow you to attach yourself to the wall you're Climbing, moving half as quickly as usual (minimum 5 feet) but letting you attempt a DC 5 flat check whenever you critically fail to prevent a fall. A single kit has only enough materials for one climber; each climber needs their own kit.

entries.name: Climbing Kit (Extreme)
entries.description:
This satchel includes 50 feet of rope, pulleys, a dozen pitons, a hammer, a grappling hook, and one set of crampons. Climbing kits allow you to attach yourself to the wall you're Climbing, moving half as quickly as usual (minimum 5 feet) but letting you attempt a DC 5 flat check whenever you critically fail to prevent a fall.

You gain a +1 item bonus to Athletics checks to Climb while using an extreme climbing kit. A single kit has only enough materials for one climber; each climber needs their own kit.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +1 item bonus to Athletics checks to Climb

entries.name: Cloak of Elvenkind
entries.description:
This cloak is deep green with a voluminous hood, embroidered with gold trim and symbols significant in elven culture. The cloak allows you to cast the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.atlgGNI1E1Ox3O3a]{Ghost Sound} cantrip as an arcane innate spell.

When you adjust the cloak's clasp (an Interact action), the cloak transforms to match the environment around you and muffles your sounds, granting you a +1 item bonus to Stealth checks.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.eeGWTG9ZAha4IIOY]{Effect: Cloak of Elvenkind}

Activate D Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You draw the hood up and gain the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{Invisibility}, with the spell's normal duration or until you pull the hood back down, whichever comes first. If you're also wearing @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.T00Xa9aDwHxd60Zh]{Boots of Elvenkind} you can activate this ability twice per day.

entries.name: Cloak of Elvenkind (高等)
entries.description:
This cloak is deep green with a voluminous hood, embroidered with gold trim and symbols significant in elven culture. The cloak allows you to cast the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.atlgGNI1E1Ox3O3a]{Ghost Sound} cantrip as an arcane innate spell.

When you adjust the cloak's clasp (an Interact action), the cloak transforms to match the environment around you and muffles your sounds, granting you a +2 item bonus to Stealth checks.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.viCX9fZzTWGuoO85]{Effect: Cloak of Elvenkind (Greater)}

Activate D Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You draw the hood up and gain the effects of a 4th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{Invisibility}, with the spell's normal duration or until you pull the hood back down, whichever comes first.

If you're also wearing @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.T00Xa9aDwHxd60Zh]{Boots of Elvenkind}, you can activate this ability twice per day, and it allows you to Sneak in forest environments even when creatures are currently observing you.

entries.name: Cloak of Immolation
entries.description:
Appearing as a magic cloak such as a cloak of elvenkind, this garment is made of highly volatile fabric. While wearing it, if you take fire damage, you also take 1d10 persistent fire damage. Taking fire damage while the persistent fire damage is in effect has no additional effect. You can extinguish the persistent fire damage as normal.

Any creature that hits you with a melee unarmed attack while you are taking this persistent fire damage takes fire damage equal to the persistent fire damage you took on your previous turn. Once the curse has activated for the first time, the boots fuse to you.

entries.name: Cloak of Repute
entries.description:
This gaudy and extravagant cloak is adorned with brilliant gems and a fur trim. While wearing the cloak, you gain instant fame and notoriety, granting you a +1 item bonus to Diplomacy checks to Make an Impression. Creatures attempting to learn about you gain the same bonus to Gather Information about you.

Activate D command

Frequency once per day

Effect You wield your great stature to make a Request of a creature. If you roll a success on the check, you get a critical success instead.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +1 item bonus to Diplomacy checks to Make an Impression

entries.name: Cloak of Repute (高等)
entries.description:
This gaudy and extravagant cloak is adorned with brilliant gems and a fur trim. While wearing the cloak, you gain instant fame and notoriety, granting you a +2 item bonus to Diplomacy checks to Make an Impression. Creatures attempting to learn about you gain the same bonus to Gather Information about you.

Activate D command

Frequency twice per day

Effect You wield your great stature to make a Request of a creature. If you roll a success on the check, you get a critical success instead.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +2 item bonus to Diplomacy checks to Make an Impression

entries.name: Cloak of Repute (上等)
entries.description:
This gaudy and extravagant cloak is adorned with brilliant gems and a fur trim. While wearing the cloak, you gain instant fame and notoriety, granting you a +3 item bonus to Diplomacy checks to Make an Impression. Creatures attempting to learn about you gain the same bonus to Gather Information about you.

Activate D command

Frequency three times per day

Effect You wield your great stature to make a Request of a creature. If you roll a success on the check, you get a critical success instead. If you roll a critical failure on your Diplomacy check when you activate the cloak, you get a failure instead.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +3 item bonus to Diplomacy checks to Make an Impression

entries.name: Cloak of the Bat
entries.description:
Sewn from several long strips of luxurious brown and black silk, this cloak grants you a +2 item bonus to Stealth checks as well as to Acrobatics checks to Maneuver in Flight. You can also use your feet to hang from any surface that can support your weight, without requiring any check, though you still must attempt Athletics checks to Climb in order to move around while inverted.

Activate D command, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You can either transform the cloak into bat-like wings that grant you a fly Speed of 30 feet for 10 minutes, or have the cloak turn you into a bat by casting a 4th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gfPjmG6Fe6D3MFjl]{Pest Form} spell on you.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.ioGzmVSmMGXWWBYb]{Effect: Cloak of the Bat}

Automatically applied effects:

  • +2 item bonus to Stealth checks
  • +2 item bonus to Acrobatics checks to Maneuver in Flight

entries.name: Cloak of the Bat (高等)
entries.description:
Sewn from several long strips of luxurious brown and black silk, this cloak grants you a +3 item bonus to Stealth checks as well as to Acrobatics checks to Maneuver in Flight. You can also use your feet to hang from any surface that can support your weight, without requiring any check, though you still must attempt Athletics checks to Climb in order to move around while inverted.

Activate D command, Interact

Frequency any number of times per day

Effect You can either transform the cloak into bat-like wings that grant you a fly Speed of 30 feet for 10 minutes, or have the cloak turn you into a bat by casting a 4th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gfPjmG6Fe6D3MFjl]{Pest Form} spell on you.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.ioGzmVSmMGXWWBYb]{Effect: Cloak of the Bat}

Automatically applied effects:

  • +3 item bonus to Stealth checks
  • +3 item bonus to Acrobatics checks to Maneuver in Flight

entries.name: Clockwork Dial
entries.description:
This small timepiece allows you to accurately track time, useful for coordinating attacks, cooking, and all other sorts of activities, without the steadiness or care necessary to use an hourglass. As always, spell durations are too inexact to be reliably tracked, as they don't last precisely the duration listed.

Protected within a brass or steel case, the clockwork mechanism of this device is turned using a small key. Most dials have a maximum duration of 1 hour, with each turn of the key adding 10 minutes to the timer, though some are crafted with longer or shorter durations and intervals. Setting the timer requires one free hand and an Interact action.

entries.name: Clockwork Recorder
entries.description:
This small recording device can be as tiny as a music box or around the size of large book and is typically concealed in hollowed-out books and jewelry. A clockwork recorder can record up to 1 hour of sound before its wax cylinders must be retrieved and replaced. Any given clockwork recorder can play back the recordings of a cylinder, regardless of whether it was the recorder used for the original recording.

Activate 3 Interact

Effect You wind the recorder to start recording sound or to play back a recording. You can have the recording or playback start immediately or be timed to start at any point up to one month later.

entries.name: Clothing (Explorer's)
entries.description: Explorer's clothing is sturdy enough that it can be reinforced to protect you, even though it isn't a suit of armor. It comes in many forms, though the most common sorts look like clerical vestments, monk's garments, or wizard's robes, as members of all three classes are likely to avoid wearing armor. For more information on explorer's clothing, see pages 275-276.

entries.name: Clothing (Fine)
entries.description: Fine clothing, suitable for a noble or royal, is made with expensive fabrics, precious metals, and intricate patterns.

entries.name: Clothing (High-Fashion Fine)
entries.description:
Fine clothing, suitable for a noble or royal, is made with expensive fabrics, precious metals, and intricate patterns. You gain a +1 item bonus to checks to Make an Impression on nobility or other upper‑class folk while wearing high‑fashion fine clothing.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +1 item bonus to checks to Make an Impression on nobility

entries.name: Clothing (Ordinary)
entries.description: Ordinary clothing is functional with basic tailoring, such as peasant garb, monk's robes, or work clothes.

entries.name: Clothing (Winter)
entries.description: Winter clothing allows you to negate the damage from severe environmental cold and reduce the damage from extreme cold to that of severe cold.

entries.name: Club
entries.description: This is a piece of stout wood shaped or repurposed to bludgeon an enemy. Clubs can be intricately carved pieces of martial art or as simple as a tree branch or piece of wood.

entries.name: 高等认知突变药剂 Cognitive mutagen (greater)
entries.description:
你的思维和认知变得异常清晰，运转自如，但肉身的存在似乎也变得转瞬即逝。

好处你在奥法（Arcana），手艺（Crafting），学识（Lore），神秘学（Occultism），社科（Society）检定和所有用于回想知识（RecallKnowledge）检定上获得物品加值。你能将回想知识检定时的大失败替换为失败。

缺陷你在武器和无武装攻击骰，运动（Athletics）和特技（Acrobatics）检定上承受-2的减值。你在由正常陷入超载（encumbered）之前能够携带的负载减少2，你能够携带的最大负载减少4。

高等；物品加值为+3，持续时间为1小时。你在创造药剂时所选的一个基于智力的技能上受训。

entries.name: 次等认知突变药剂 Cognitive mutagen (lesser)
entries.description:
你的思维和认知变得异常清晰，运转自如，但肉身的存在似乎也变得转瞬即逝。

好处你在奥法（Arcana），手艺（Crafting），学识（Lore），神秘学（Occultism），社科（Society）检定和所有用于回想知识（RecallKnowledge）检定上获得物品加值。你能将回想知识检定时的大失败替换为失败。

缺陷你在武器和无武装攻击骰，运动（Athletics）和特技（Acrobatics）检定上承受-2的减值。你在由正常陷入超载（encumbered）之前能够携带的负载减少2，你能够携带的最大负载减少4。

次等：物品加值为+1，持续时间为1分钟。

entries.name: 上等认知突变药剂 Cognitive mutagen (major)
entries.description:
你的思维和认知变得异常清晰，运转自如，但肉身的存在似乎也变得转瞬即逝。

好处你在奥法（Arcana），手艺（Crafting），学识（Lore），神秘学（Occultism），社科（Society）检定和所有用于回想知识（RecallKnowledge）检定上获得物品加值。你能将回想知识检定时的大失败替换为失败。

缺陷你在武器和无武装攻击骰，运动（Athletics）和特技（Acrobatics）检定上承受-2的减值。你在由正常陷入超载（encumbered）之前能够携带的负载减少2，你能够携带的最大负载减少4。

上等；物品加值为+4，持续时间为1小时。你在创造药剂时所选的一个技能上受训。

entries.name: 中等认知突变药剂 Cognitive mutagen (moderate)
entries.description:
你的思维和认知变得异常清晰，运转自如，但肉身的存在似乎也变得转瞬即逝。

好处你在奥法（Arcana），手艺（Crafting），学识（Lore），神秘学（Occultism），社科（Society）检定和所有用于回想知识（RecallKnowledge）检定上获得物品加值。你能将回想知识检定时的大失败替换为失败。

缺陷你在武器和无武装攻击骰，运动（Athletics）和特技（Acrobatics）检定上承受-2的减值。你在由正常陷入超载（encumbered）之前能够携带的负载减少2，你能够携带的最大负载减少4。

中等；物品加值为+2，持续时间为10分钟。

entries.name: Cold Iron Blanch (高等)
entries.description:
Activate 1 Interact

You can pour a vial of this dark liquid onto one melee weapon, one thrown weapon, or 10 pieces of ammunition. When used on a melee or thrown weapon, rather than ammunition, the blanch lasts for the listed duration or 10 successful Strikes, whichever comes first. When you use it on ammunition, the blanch is expended on a given piece of ammunition after firing it, whether it hits or not. A cold iron blanch contains small amounts of alchemist's fire, so it must be used all at once; an opened vial ignites to melt the cold iron onto the weapon and is quickly consumed. The weapon or ammunition counts as cold iron instead of its normal precious material (such as silver) for any physical damage it deals, if applicable.

The blanch provides high-grade cold iron, so you can use it on any magic weapon. It lasts for 1 hour.

entries.name: Cold Iron Blanch (次等)
entries.description:
Activate 1 Interact

You can pour a vial of this dark liquid onto one melee weapon, one thrown weapon, or 10 pieces of ammunition. When used on a melee or thrown weapon, rather than ammunition, the blanch lasts for the listed duration or 10 successful Strikes, whichever comes first. When you use it on ammunition, the blanch is expended on a given piece of ammunition after firing it, whether it hits or not. A cold iron blanch contains small amounts of alchemist's fire, so it must be used all at once; an opened vial ignites to melt the cold iron onto the weapon and is quickly consumed. The weapon or ammunition counts as cold iron instead of its normal precious material (such as silver) for any physical damage it deals, if applicable.

The blanch provides low-grade cold iron, so you can use it on a magic weapon up to 8th level, or ammunition for such a weapon. It lasts for 1 minute.

entries.name: Cold Iron Blanch (中等)
entries.description:
Activate 1 Interact
