entries.name: 高等宁静突变药剂 Serene mutagen (greater)
entries.description:
你获得了内心的安宁，能够专注于细微的事物并冷静地应对心智攻击，但你会意识到暴力令人生厌。

好处你在意志豁免和察觉（Perception）、医疗（Medicine）、自然（Natue）、宗教（Religion）和生存（Survival）检定上获得物品加值。当你尝试以意志豁免对抗心智效果时，这个加值会提升。

缺陷你在攻击骰和进攻性法术的豁免DC上承受-1的减值，并且在所有武器、无武装攻击和法术伤害的每个伤害骰上承受-1的减值。

物品加值为+3，在对抗心智效果时为+4，持续时间为1小时。当你在对抗心智效果的意志豁免上取得成功时，你可以将其替换为大成功，并且你可以将对抗心智效果的意志豁免上取得的大失败视作失败。

entries.name: 次等宁静突变药剂 Serene mutagen (lesser)
entries.description:
你获得了内心的安宁，能够专注于细微的事物并冷静地应对心智攻击，但你会意识到暴力令人生厌。

好处你在意志豁免和察觉（Perception）、医疗（Medicine）、自然（Natue）、宗教（Religion）和生存（Survival）检定上获得物品加值。当你尝试以意志豁免对抗心智效果时，这个加值会提升。

缺陷你在攻击骰和进攻性法术的豁免DC上承受-1的减值，并且在所有武器、无武装攻击和法术伤害的每个伤害骰上承受-1的减值。

次等：物品加值为+1，在对抗心智效果时为+2，持续时间为1分钟。

entries.name: 上等宁静突变药剂 Serene mutagen (major)
entries.description:
你获得了内心的安宁，能够专注于细微的事物并冷静地应对心智攻击，但你会意识到暴力令人生厌。

好处你在意志豁免和察觉（Perception）、医疗（Medicine）、自然（Natue）、宗教（Religion）和生存（Survival）检定上获得物品加值。当你尝试以意志豁免对抗心智效果时，这个加值会提升。

缺陷你在攻击骰和进攻性法术的豁免DC上承受-1的减值，并且在所有武器、无武装攻击和法术伤害的每个伤害骰上承受-1的减值。

Thebonusis+4,andthedurationis1hour.WhenyourollasuccessonaWillsaveagainstamentaleffect,yougetacriticalsuccessinstead,andyourcriticalfailuresonWillsavesagainstmentaleffectsbecomefailuresinstead.

entries.name: 中等宁静突变药剂 Serene mutagen (moderate)
entries.description:
你获得了内心的安宁，能够专注于细微的事物并冷静地应对心智攻击，但你会意识到暴力令人生厌。

好处你在意志豁免和察觉（Perception）、医疗（Medicine）、自然（Natue）、宗教（Religion）和生存（Survival）检定上获得物品加值。当你尝试以意志豁免对抗心智效果时，这个加值会提升。

缺陷你在攻击骰和进攻性法术的豁免DC上承受-1的减值，并且在所有武器、无武装攻击和法术伤害的每个伤害骰上承受-1的减值。

物品加值为+2，在对抗心智效果时为+3，持续时间为10分钟。

entries.name: Serithtial
entries.description:
Perception +28; normal vision and hearing within 60 feet
Communication empathy (partner only)
Skills Iomedae Lore +29, Religion +26, Zon-Kuthon Lore +29
Int +2, Wis +1, Cha +2
Will +30

The legendary blade Serithtial is said to have been forged by Iomedae, goddess of honor, justice, and valor. She is an intelligent +4 major striking @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.DH0kB9Wbr5pDeunX]{Holy} bastard sword. Although the sword is made of steel, Serithtial is also treated as cold iron and silver, allowing her to deal more damage to certain supernatural creatures. She glows as bright as a torch, but you or Serithtial can suppress or resume this glow as a single action, which has the concentrate trait. In addition, Strikes with Serithtial deal an additional 2d6 damage against creatures that are worshippers of Zon-Kuthon, and while wielding Serithtial, you constantly benefit from death ward and freedom of movement spells that function only against effects created by followers of Zon-Kuthon.

Serithtial was forged as a bastard sword, and she reverts to this shape when no one wields her, but she can also detect what sort of blade her current wielder prefers and transform into it (choosing from dagger, shortsword, longsword, scimitar, falchion, greatsword, rapier, or bastard sword) using an action, which she does when first held. The wielder can empathically tell Serithtial to transform at any time by using a single action, which has the concentrate trait, after which Serithtial uses an action to transform.

Serithtial is willing to work with a partner of almost any alignment as long as they are dedicated to defeating the great wyrm Kazavon and the forces of Zon-Kuthon. If you ignore those threats and pursue your own agenda instead, before long Serithtial attempts to seize control of your body (DC 45 Will save to resist her control), though she typically remains in control for only long enough to find a more worthy partner. You can attempt a new Will save each day to retake control of your body.

Activate envision; Frequency once per hour; Effect Serithtial spends the appropriate number of actions and casts a 9th level heal or zone of truth spell (DC 45 for either of the two spells).

Destruction If Kazavon or a great wyrm shadow dragon who is a worshipper of Zon-Kuthon uses its breath weapon on Serithtial while she is unattended, the sword melts into a pool of mundane iron.

entries.name: Serrating
entries.description:
A serrating weapon's bladed edge separates into jagged, swirling shards that spin along the blade. When dealing slashing damage, the weapon deals an additional 1d4 damage.

Activate A Interact; Effect You brandish the weapon and focus its power, causing the serrated shards to buzz as they spin at a dizzying speed. On your next hit with the weapon this turn that deals slashing damage, the serrating rune adds an additional 1d12 damage instead of the additional 1d4 damage, and then the shards return to their usual speed.

entries.name: 性转血清 Serum of sex shift
entries.description:
喝下这瓶药水后，你的身体立刻发生变化，呈现出你自选的一组性征，你的外貌和生理机能也随之发生改变。你可以轻微调整变化的细节，但你总是与原来的形态有着强烈的“亲族相似”。

这个魔法立刻生效并且无法被反制。你新的身体结构与你原来的身体同样健康和实用，而且可能让你能够繁殖（根据你所属族裔的生态）。喝下另一瓶性转血清可以让你选择变回原来的形态，或者选择接受其他的性征。如果你怀孕了，或者你属于一种没有性别区别的族裔，则该药水不会生效。大多数族裔都有广泛的性别差异，有些差异很常见，而另一些则十分稀有。

entries.name: 暗影符文 Shadow
entries.description: 蚀刻该符文的护甲变城朦胧的黑色。穿戴者的潜行检定获得+1物品加值。

entries.name: 高等暗影符文 Shadow (greater)
entries.description:
蚀刻该符文的护甲变城朦胧的黑色。穿戴者的潜行检定获得+1物品加值。

类型：高等暗影（greater）；等级：9；价格：650gp

物品加值为+2。

entries.name: 上等暗影符文 Shadow (major)
entries.description:
蚀刻该符文的护甲变城朦胧的黑色。穿戴者的潜行检定获得+3物品加值。

上等：物品加值为+3。

entries.name: 阴影精华
entries.description:
Distilled from the Plane of Shadow, this oily substance imposes tenebrous effects. The enfeebled condition from shadow essence lasts for 24 hours.

Activate D Interact (Injury)

Saving Throw DC 29 Fortitude

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r 3d6#negative]] negative damage and [[/r 2d6#poison]] poison damage (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r 3d6#negative]] negative damage, [[/r 2d6#poison]], and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} 1 (1 round)

Stage 3 [[/r 3d6#negative]] negative damage, [[/r 2d6#poison]], and enfeebled 2 (1 round)

entries.name: 鲨齿咒符 Shark tooth charm
entries.description:
触发你用特技Acrobatics进行一次逃脱Escape，但尚未投掷结果；条件你在特技Acrobatics上达到专家

这条干枯海草编成的项链上挂着形状像是小型鲨鱼牙齿的坠饰。当你启动项链，如果你在触发的检定中投出了成功，则改为大成功；如果你投出了大失败，则改为失败。如果你在对抗一个正在擒抱你的生物的特技Acrobatics检定中失败了，鲨鱼牙齿也会突然从你皮肤上钻出，令该生物要么以一个自由动作释放你，要么承受2d8点穿刺伤害。

entries.name: Sheath
entries.description: A sheath or scabbard lets you easily carry a weapon on your person.

entries.name: Shield Bash
entries.description: A shield bash is not actually a weapon, but a maneuver in which you thrust or swing your shield to hit your foe with an impromptu attack.

entries.name: Shield Boss
entries.description: Typically a round, convex, or conical piece of thick metal attached to the center of a shield, a shield boss increases the bludgeoning damage of a shield bash.

entries.name: Shield of the Unified Legion
entries.description:
This high-grade orichalcum shield (Hardness 16, HP 64, and BT 32) bears a +3 major striking shield boss that cannot be removed.

It gleams brightly in any light, drawing attention at all times.

When you Raise this Shield, ephemeral reflections of it appear in front of each of your allies within 30 feet, granting them its +2 circumstance bonus to AC for as long as they are within 30 feet of you and your shield is raised. @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.ah41XCrV4LFsVyzl]{Effect: Shield of the Unified Legion}

Activate (2 actions) Interact (force)

Frequency once per minute

Effect You heft the shield and thrust it forward, causing ephemeral reflections of the shield to surround you and then rush outward in a 90-foot line or 60-foot cone (your choice).

Make a shield bash Strike against each enemy within the area, except that the damage dealt is force damage. Each target you hit is moved 10 feet away from you (each target you critically hit is also knocked prone). This is forced movement. These shield bashes count against your multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after you have made all these attacks.

entries.name: Shield Sconce
entries.description: This carefully balanced metal bracket can be attached to the front or top of a shield or tower shield (but not a buckler), allowing you to carry a torch without giving up your shield or holding it in your other hand. While carrying a torch in this way, you must attempt a DC 11 flat check every time you use the Shield Block reaction; on a failure, the torch is extinguished.

entries.name: Shield Spikes
entries.description: These metal spikes are strategically placed on the defensive side of the shield to deal piercing damage with a shield bash.

entries.name: Shielding Salve
entries.description:
Activate 1 Interact

This shimmering paste has many properties of a shield spell. When you slather it onto a creature or object, the target gains a +1 circumstance bonus to AC for 1 round.

The first time a physical attack or a magic missile hits the target during that round, the oil prevents 5 damage from that attack or spell, and then the oil's effect ends.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.16tOZk4qy329s2aK]{Effect: Shielding Salve}

entries.name: 变形符文 Shifting
entries.description: 效果：武器变型成另一种需要同样手来持握的近战武器。武器符文和任何珍贵材料效果都在新武器形态上有效。但若性能符文不适合新武器形态，则该符文效果被压制，直到它变型成的新形态能适合该符文为止。

entries.name: 闪光弹药 Shining ammunition
entries.description: 一支闪光弹药闪着暗淡的光。发射后，该弹药会发出明亮的光芒，使半径20尺范围内成为明亮照明（并使更远的20尺范围内成为昏暗照明），持续10分钟。如果它命中了一个目标，它会固定在目标身上，使目标发出同样的光芒。一个生物可以用一个交互Interact动作移除弹药，但弹药仍然会持续照明，直到持续时间结束或被摧毁。

entries.name: Shining Wayfinder
entries.description:
A shining wayfinder is a polished silver compass blessed by the power of benevolent deities. It has the usual functions of a wayfinder, except instead of an activation to cast light, the shining wayfinder has the following two activations.

Activate D command, Interact; Effect You hold the wayfinder and ask for guidance. The wayfinder casts guidance on you.

Activate D command, Interact; Frequency once per day; Effect You call upon the wayfinder's divine blessings for yourself and your allies. The wayfinder casts bless, with an emanation centered on itself. Once per turn, you can use a single action, which has the concentrate trait, to increase the emanation's radius by 5 feet.

entries.name: Shiver
entries.description:
A compound produced from the hallucinogenic venom of certain spiders, shiver is common in black markets. The addiction to shiver has the virulent trait.

Activate A Interact (Ingested)

Saving Throw DC 19 Fortitude

Maximum Duration 4 hours

Stage 1 whenever you become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened}, reduce that condition's value by 1 (10 minutes)

Stage 2 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy} 2 (1 hour)

Stage 3 asleep (1 hour)

entries.name: 电击符文 Shock
entries.description: 电弧在武器周身穿梭，用其命中额外造成1d6点电击伤害。若重击，电弧对目标10尺内另外最多2个你所选的目标造成等量的电击伤害。

entries.name: 高等电击符文 Shock (greater)
entries.description:
电弧在武器周身穿梭，用其命中额外造成1d6点电击伤害。若重击，电弧对目标10尺内另外最多2个你所选的目标造成等量的电击伤害。

高等：该武器造成的电击伤害忽略目标的电击抗力（包括重击时对另外生物造成的电击伤害）。

entries.name: Shoony Shovel
entries.description:
This ornate, compact shovel has a golden handle wrapped with beautiful crimson bulette leather. Its silver head never gets dirty or worn no matter how much you use it. Its true magic, however, is in its ability to dig on its own.

Activate D command, envision; Frequency once per day; Effect You place the shovel in a starting position and specify the dimensions and direction to dig (such as "Dig down 8 feet in a rectangle sized 30 feet by 40 feet" or "Dig straight ahead for 30 feet"). The shovel then animates and digs on its own at a rate of one 5-foot cube per 10 minutes until the task is complete or it is picked up. It can dig through dirt, gravel, sand, snow, or similar loose material, but the shovel stops digging (or digs around, if commanded) if it strikes stone or another solid material. A shoony shovel can sense if its digging path will cause a building to collapse, harm a creature, or otherwise create significant problems, in which case it automatically stops digging.

entries.name: Shortbow
entries.description: This smaller bow is made of a single piece of wood and favored by skirmishers and cavalry.

entries.name: Shortsword
entries.description: These blades come in a variety of shapes and styles, but they are typically 2 feet long.

entries.name: Shot of the First Vault
entries.description:
Legends claim that some long-forgotten god stole the original bundle of shots of the First Vault from Abadar's repository. Since then, individual pieces have turned up throughout the multiverse. When you pick up a shot of the First Vault, it immediately reshapes itself to function with any ranged weapon and establishes you as its owner until another creature picks it up. As its owner, you can use the shot's single-action activation after shooting it.

Instead of rolling weapon damage dice, a shot of the First Vault deals 25 damage plus any bonuses or additional damage as if 25 were the result of the weapon's damage dice; the damage type matches that normally dealt by the weapon. Upon damaging a creature, the shot of the First Vault shatters, and the fragments ricochet to hit any other enemies within 30 feet, making attack rolls with the same attack bonus. The shattered fragments remain lodged in the creatures they damage; the creatures are clumsy 2 while the fragments remain in place. A total of 3 actions, which have the manipulate trait, are required to remove the fragments from yourself or an adjacent creature; alternatively, a single action and a successful DC 30 Medicine check can be used. A critical failure on this Medicine check deals 10 persistent bleed damage to the creature with the embedded fragment.

Activate A command; Effect You recall the shot of the First Vault, which automatically reloads itself into your weapon. If the shot had fragmented, the fragments violently dislodge themselves, dealing 15 persistent bleed damage to each creature in which they were embedded. The fragments then unite to re-form the shot of the First Vault, which automatically reloads itself into your weapon.

Activate T Interact; Requirements The shot is loaded in your ranged weapon, or at hand if your ranged weapon has a reload of 0; Effect You line up a perfectly aimed attack directly toward the First Vault. You Strike a creature, then the shot of the First Vault attempts to bring your target with it as it returns to the First Vault. Unless your attack roll is a critical failure, the creature must attempt a DC 45 Reflex save; this effect has the incapacitation trait. Regardless, the shot of the First Vault returns to the First Vault.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.
Success The creature is moved 1d20×50 feet in the direction you fired. If this causes it to hit a solid object, it takes 50 bludgeoning damage.
Failure The creature is transported to a random location on the plane of Axis.
Critical Failure The creature is transported to the First Vault. Unless it is capable of eluding Abadar's precautions, it is likely unable to escape the Vault on its own.

Destruction If 10 shots of the First Vault are all fired at the same group of keketar or izfiitar proteans within 1 minute of each other, each shot was a hit, and the shots are then recalled, the shots collide as they attempt to re-form and crumble to dust.

entries.name: Shrinking Potion
entries.description:
This fungus-flavored potion conveys the effects of the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.PjhUmyKnq6K5uDby]{Shrink} spell to make you and all your gear smaller. After the onset, you remain small for 10 minutes.

Onset 1 minute

entries.name: 高等缩小药水 Shrinking potion (greater)
entries.description:
这瓶霉味药水能提供缩小术Shrink的效果，让你和你身上的所有装备变小。在潜伏期过后，你在10分钟内都维持变化后的体型。

高等：药水没有潜伏期，持续1小时，提供4环的缩小术Shrink的效果。另外，你在缩小时进行的隐匿Stealth检定上获得+2物品加值。

entries.name: Shuriken
entries.description: This "throwing star" is a small piece of flat metal with sharp edges, designed to be flung with a flick of the wrist.

entries.name: Sickle
entries.description: Originally a farming tool used for reaping grain, this one‑handed weapon has a short wooden handle ending in a curved blade, sometimes sharpened on both sides.

entries.name: Sight-Theft Grit
entries.description:
Activate 1 Interact;

This blackish grit seems to absorb light and resembles particularly dark flakes of black pepper. Infused with the blindness spell, sight-theft grit causes the victim's sight to dim and then depart altogether. The @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} condition from this poison lasts for an additional 24 hours once the poison has run its course.

Saving Throw DC 28 Fortitude;

Onset 10 minutes;

Maximum Duration 14 hours;

Stage 1 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} and a -2 status penalty to visual Perception checks (1 hour);

Stage 2 dazzled and a -4 status penalty to visual Perception checks (1 hour);

Stage 3 blinded ([[/r 2d6 #hours]] hours)

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.VosLNn2M8S7JH67D]{Blindness}.

entries.name: Signal Whistle
entries.description: When sounded, a signal whistle can be heard clearly up to half a mile away across open terrain.

entries.name: 信号圈套 Signaling snare
entries.description: A subtle snare used in hunting or tracking, a signaling snare often consists of carefully prepared earth, piled sand or stones, specific arrangements of vegetation, and so forth. When a creature enters a square of a signaling snare, nothing happens to the creature, but instead it causes a small, unobtrusive disruption to the terrain that allows the snare's creator or another creature who knows what to look for to determine whether a creature of the appropriate size entered the square.

entries.name: Silver Buckler (High-Grade)
entries.description:
Silver shields don't typically have an additional effect, though when used for a shield bash, they are silver weapons.

The shield has Hardness 6, HP 24, and BT 12.

Craft Requirements silver worth at least 2,500 gp

entries.name: Silver Buckler (Low-Grade)
entries.description:
Silver shields don't typically have an additional effect, though when used for a shield bash, they are silver weapons.

The shield has Hardness 1, HP 4, and BT 2.

Craft Requirements silver worth at least 15 sp

entries.name: Silver Buckler (Standard-Grade)
entries.description:
Silver shields don't typically have an additional effect, though when used for a shield bash, they are silver weapons.

The shield has Hardness 3, HP 12, BT 6.

Craft Requirements silver worth at least 375 sp

entries.name: Silver Chunk
entries.description:
Silver weapons are a bane to creatures ranging from devils to werewolves. Silver items are less durable than steel items, and low-grade silver items are usually merely silver-plated.

Silver Items

Silver Items

Standard-grade 5 20 10
High-grade 8 32 16

entries.name: Silver Dragon's Breath Potion (Adult)
entries.description:
This liquid contains blood from a silver dragon. For 1 hour after you imbibe the concoction, you can unleash a silver dragon's breath weapon. The potency of the breath depends on the potion's type, based on the age of the dragon whose blood was used to make the potion.

Exhaling dragon breath uses a single action. You create a 15-foot cone of cold which deals 6d6 cold damage. All creatures in the area must attempt a DC 29 basic Reflex save.

After you use the breath weapon, you can't do so again for 1d4 rounds.

entries.name: Silver Dragon's Breath Potion (Wyrm)
entries.description:
This liquid contains blood from a silver dragon. For 1 hour after you imbibe the concoction, you can unleash a silver dragon's breath weapon. The potency of the breath depends on the potion's type, based on the age of the dragon whose blood was used to make the potion.

Exhaling dragon breath uses a single action. You create a 15-foot cone of cold which deals 10d6 cold damage. All creatures in the area must attempt a DC 37 basic Reflex save.

After you use the breath weapon, you can't do so again for 1d4 rounds.

entries.name: Silver Dragon's Breath Potion (Young)
entries.description:
This liquid contains blood from a silver dragon. For 1 hour after you imbibe the concoction, you can unleash a silver dragon's breath weapon. The potency of the breath depends on the potion's type, based on the age of the dragon whose blood was used to make the potion.

Exhaling dragon breath uses a single action. You create a 15-foot cone of fire which deals 4d6 cold damage. All creatures in the area must attempt a DC 23 basic Reflex save.

After you use the breath weapon, you can't do so again for 1d4 rounds.

entries.name: Silver Ingot
entries.description:
Silver weapons are a bane to creatures ranging from devils to werewolves. Silver items are less durable than steel items, and low-grade silver items are usually merely silver-plated.

entries.name: Silver Shield (High-Grade)
entries.description:
Silver shields don't typically have an additional effect, though when used for a shield bash, they are silver weapons.

The shield has Hardness 8 HP 32, and BT 16.

Craft Requirements silver worth at least 2,750 gp

entries.name: Silver Shield (Low-Grade)
entries.description:
Silver shields don't typically have an additional effect, though when used for a shield bash, they are silver weapons.

The shield has Hardness 3, HP 12, and BT 6.

Craft Requirements silver worth at least 17 sp

entries.name: Silver Shield (Standard-Grade)
entries.description:
Silver shields don't typically have an additional effect, though when used for a shield bash, they are silver weapons.

The shield has Hardness 5, HP 20, and BT 10.

Craft Requirements silver worth at least 425 sp

entries.name: 银辉 Silversheen
entries.description:
Activate A Interact

You can slather this silvery paste onto one melee weapon, one thrown weapon, or 10 pieces of ammunition. Silversheen spoils quickly, so once you open a vial, you must use it all at once, rather than saving it.

For the next hour, the weapon or ammunition counts as silver instead of its normal precious material (such as cold iron) for any physical damage it deals.

entries.name: 高等巧舌突变药剂 Silvertongue mutagen (greater)
entries.description:
你的容貌变得引人注目，你的嗓音悦耳且令人动容，然而你眼中的现实和数理都变得模糊不清，起伏的情绪遮蔽了你理性思考的能力。

好处你在交涉（Deception）、欺骗（Diplomacy）、威吓（Intimidation）和表演（Performance）检定上获得物品加值。你在这些技能上取得的大失败被替换为失败。

缺陷你在奥法（Arcana）、手艺（Crafting）、学识（Lore）、神秘学（Occultism）和社科（Society）检定上承受-2的减值。选择一个你已受训的技能；在持续时间内，你在这个技能上变得未受训。所有你用于回想知识（RecallKnowledge）的检定上取得的失败都变为大失败。

物品加值为+3，持续时间为1小时。

entries.name: 次等巧舌突变药剂 Silvertongue mutagen (lesser)
entries.description:
你的容貌变得引人注目，你的嗓音悦耳且令人动容，然而你眼中的现实和数理都变得模糊不清，起伏的情绪遮蔽了你理性思考的能力。

好处你在交涉（Deception）、欺骗（Diplomacy）、威吓（Intimidation）和表演（Performance）检定上获得物品加值。你在这些技能上取得的大失败被替换为失败。

缺陷你在奥法（Arcana）、手艺（Crafting）、学识（Lore）、神秘学（Occultism）和社科（Society）检定上承受-2的减值。选择一个你已受训的技能；在持续时间内，你在这个技能上变得未受训。所有你用于回想知识（RecallKnowledge）的检定上取得的失败都变为大失败。

次等：物品加值为+1，持续时间为1分钟。

entries.name: 上等巧舌突变药剂 Silvertongue mutagen (major)
entries.description:
你的容貌变得引人注目，你的嗓音悦耳且令人动容，然而你眼中的现实和数理都变得模糊不清，起伏的情绪遮蔽了你理性思考的能力。

好处你在交涉（Deception）、欺骗（Diplomacy）、威吓（Intimidation）和表演（Performance）检定上获得物品加值。你在这些技能上取得的大失败被替换为失败。

缺陷你在奥法（Arcana）、手艺（Crafting）、学识（Lore）、神秘学（Occultism）和社科（Society）检定上承受-2的减值。选择一个你已受训的技能；在持续时间内，你在这个技能上变得未受训。所有你用于回想知识（RecallKnowledge）的检定上取得的失败都变为大失败。

物品加值为+4，持续时间为1小时。

entries.name: 中等巧舌突变药剂 Silvertongue mutagen (moderate)
entries.description:
你的容貌变得引人注目，你的嗓音悦耳且令人动容，然而你眼中的现实和数理都变得模糊不清，起伏的情绪遮蔽了你理性思考的能力。

好处你在交涉（Deception）、欺骗（Diplomacy）、威吓（Intimidation）和表演（Performance）检定上获得物品加值。你在这些技能上取得的大失败被替换为失败。

缺陷你在奥法（Arcana）、手艺（Crafting）、学识（Lore）、神秘学（Occultism）和社科（Society）检定上承受-2的减值。选择一个你已受训的技能；在持续时间内，你在这个技能上变得未受训。所有你用于回想知识（RecallKnowledge）的检定上取得的失败都变为大失败。

物品加值为+2，持续时间为10分钟。

entries.name: Sinew-Shock Serum (高等)
entries.description:
Activate A Interact

This serum jolts the body to help shake off physical debilitations. When you drink this elixir, it attempts a counteract check with a 1d20+19 counteract modifier to remove the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition from a single source, using the source of that condition to determine the counteract level and DC.

entries.name: Sinew-Shock Serum (次等)
entries.description:
Activate A Interact

This serum jolts the body to help shake off physical debilitations. When you drink this elixir, it attempts a counteract check with a 1d20+6 counteract modifier to remove the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition from a single source, using the source of that condition to determine the counteract level and DC.

entries.name: Sinew-Shock Serum (上等)
entries.description:
Activate A Interact

This serum jolts the body to help shake off physical debilitations. When you drink this elixir, it attempts a counteract check with a 1d20+28 counteract modifier to remove the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition from a single source, using the source of that condition to determine the counteract level and DC.

entries.name: Sinew-Shock Serum (中等)
entries.description:
Activate A Interact

This serum jolts the body to help shake off physical debilitations. When you drink this elixir, it attempts a counteract check with a 1d20+8 counteract modifier to remove the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition from a single source, using the source of that condition to determine the counteract level and DC.

entries.id: Singing Bowl of the Versatile Stance
entries.name: Singing Bowl of the Versatile Stance
entries.description:
In true Iroran form, the simplicity of this small, inverted copper bell belies its flawlessness. When struck with a mallet (included with the singing bowl), it emits a harmonious tone that inspires bodily perfection in those who know how to hear it.

Activate A Interact (auditory); Effect While holding the singing bowl of the versatile stance with one hand, you strike the lip of it with a mallet held in the other. Anyone within 60 feet currently in a stance can spend a reaction to use one of their stance actions in order to change to a different stance.

entries.name: Singing Sword
entries.description:
Perception +11; precise vision 30 feet, imprecise hearing 30 feet
Communication speech (Common and four other common languages)
Skills Performance +15
Int +2, Wis +2, Cha +4
Will +13 (+17 against attempts to quiet its singing)

A singing sword is a +1 striking longsword imbued with the consciousness of a boisterous bard, and therefore constantly sings at all times. A singing sword can't stop singing and in fact communicates in no way other than by singing. A successful Diplomacy or Intimidation check against its Will DC can convince it to quiet its singing to a whisper for 10 minutes, or 20 minutes on a critical success, though it quickly grows displeased at anyone who attempts this repeatedly. The singing sword can spend its actions to attack on its own, with the effects of a dancing weapon's activation, except that its attack modifier is +12. Additionally, it can perform the following activations; each casts a composition spell and follows all the usual rules for compositions.

Activate A command; Frequency once per minute; Effect The singing sword casts inspire courage.

Activate A command; Frequency once per minute; Effect The singing sword casts inspire defense.

Activate R command; Frequency once per hour; Trigger You or an ally within 60 feet rolls a saving throw against an auditory effect; Effect The singing sword casts counter performance.

entries.name: Sinister Knight
entries.description:
Sinister knight armor shrouds the wearer's identity in secrecy, allowing Crimson Reclaimers to pass among foes without being immediately unmasked. The wearer gains a +1 item bonus to Deception checks.

Activate A envision; Effect With a thought, the wearer activates a disguise. While the sinister knight armor's disguise is active, any identifying insignia or aesthetic of the armor is replaced by generic malevolent aesthetics such as spikes or demonic faces. While in the disguise, the wearer is always considered to be taking precautions against lifesense, and even a creature that successfully notices the wearer with its lifesense mistakes the wearer for an undead unless it critically succeeds at its Perception check or the wearer critically fails a Deception or Stealth check. Finally, while in the disguise, the rune attempts to counteract any effects that would reveal your alignment; on a successful counteract check, rather than negate the effect, the rune causes the effect to perceive your alignment as evil (maintaining any lawful or chaotic component of your alignment).

The wearer can Dismiss the disguise, and if the wearer's armor is removed, the disguise deactivates automatically.

entries.name: Sixfingers Elixir (高等)
entries.description:
Activation 1 Interact

This gritty, spicy fluid causes you to grow a sixth finger on each hand and gives you a spiderlike grip.

You gain a +2 item bonus to your Reflex DC to keep from being @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarmed} and a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb} Speed of 20 feet for the listed duration.

Duration 8 hours.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.TkRuKKYyPHTGPfgf]{Effect: Sixfingers Elixir (Greater)}

entries.name: Sixfingers Elixir (次等)
entries.description:
Activation 1 Interact

This gritty, spicy fluid causes you to grow a sixth finger on each hand and gives you a spiderlike grip.

You gain a +2 item bonus to your Reflex DC to keep from being @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarmed} and a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb} Speed of 20 feet for the listed duration.

Duration 10 minutes.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.XrlChFETfe8avLsX]{Effect: Sixfingers Elixir (Lesser)}

entries.name: Sixfingers Elixir (中等)
entries.description:
Activation 1 Interact

This gritty, spicy fluid causes you to grow a sixth finger on each hand and gives you a spiderlike grip.

You gain a +2 item bonus to your Reflex DC to keep from being @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarmed} and a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb} Speed of 20 feet for the listed duration.

Duration 1 hour.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.qzRcSQ0HTTp58hV2]{Effect: Sixfingers Elixir (Moderate)}

entries.name: Skarja's Heartstone
entries.description:
This pale gemstone grants its wearer a +2 item bonus to saving throws and the ability to discern a target's alignment (as @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.QnTtGCAvdWRU4spv]{Detect Alignment}, but can detect chaotic, evil, good, and lawful auras simultaneously) at will by peering through the gemstone.

Like all hag heartstones, this gemstone is powered by Skarja's spirit. Skarja does not need to wear her heartstone to benefit from its powers, but she cannot use them if she hasn't touched her heartstone in the past 7 days. If Skarja's heartstone is separated from her for more than 7 days (or if she's been dead for 7 days), it becomes a non-magical gemstone.

Skarja's heartstone allows her to use additional occult innate spells: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.D2nPKbIS67m9199U]{Ethereal Jaunt} (9th level) and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.GYmXvS9NJ7QwfWGg]{Bind Soul} at will, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IqJ9URobmJ9L9UBG]{Shadow Blast} (6th level) twice per day, and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.PHVHBbdHeQRfjLmE]{Spirit Blast} once per day.

Activate: Acommand;

Requirements: You must be touching the heartstone.

Effect: The heartstone attempts to counteract one disease affecting you (counteract level 7, counteract modifier [[/r 1d20+23]]).

Craft Requirements You must be a night hag.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +2 item bonus to saving throws

entries.name: Skeleton Key
entries.description:
A grinning skull tops the bow of this macabre key. This key can be used in place of thieves' tools when attempting to Pick a Lock, and it grants a +1 item bonus to the Thievery check.

If the skeleton key becomes broken due to a critical failure on the check, it works as normal thieves' tools and loses its benefits until repaired.

Activate F Interact

Frequency once per day

Trigger You attempt to Pick a Lock but haven't rolled yet; Effect The key casts @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.6Ot4N22t5tPD51BO]{Knock} on the lock you're trying to pick.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +1 item bonus to Thievery checks to Pick a Lock

entries.name: 高等万能钥匙 Skeleton key (greater)
entries.description:
这把魔法钥匙的顶端有着一只狰狞的头骨。这把钥匙可以在尝试开锁的时候代替盗贼工具，并且在贼活检定上提供+1物品加值。如果万能钥匙因为检定大失败而变成破损状态，那么直到被修复之前它都无法提供加值，并且只能如同普通的盗贼工具一般被使用。

频率：每日1次；触发：你尝试开锁，但还未投骰；

效果：钥匙对你尝试要打开的锁施放敲击术（knock）。

高等：这簇药匙提供+2加值，并且有一个额外的启动效果：

启动：[AA]交互；频率：每日1次；

效果：钥匙提供+2物品加值，你可以每小时启动钥匙1次。

entries.name: Skeptic's Elixir (Greater)
entries.description:
Duration 1 hour

Activate 1 Interact

This elixir sharpens your mind and allows you to see through lies, falsehoods, and magical trickery. You gain a +3 item bonus to Perception checks and Perception DCs to notice falsehoods, whether they're spoken lies or written deceit. You gain this same item bonus to Will saves.

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.TsWUTODTVi487SEz]{Effect: Skeptic's Elixir (Greater)}

entries.name: Skeptic's Elixir (Lesser)
entries.description:
Duration 1 minute

Activate 1 Interact

This elixir sharpens your mind and allows you to see through lies, falsehoods, and magical trickery. You gain a +1 item bonus to Perception checks and Perception DCs to notice falsehoods, whether they're spoken lies or written deceit. You gain this same item bonus to Will saves.

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.5Gof60StUppR2Xn9]{Effect: Skeptic's Elixir (Lesser)}

entries.name: Skeptic's Elixir (Moderate)
entries.description:
Duration 10 minute

Activate 1 Interact

This elixir sharpens your mind and allows you to see through lies, falsehoods, and magical trickery. You gain a +2 item bonus to Perception checks and Perception DCs to notice falsehoods, whether they're spoken lies or written deceit. You gain this same item bonus to Will saves.

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.mG6S6zm6hxaF7Tla]{Effect: Skeptic's Elixir (Moderate)}

entries.name: Skinsaw Mask
entries.description:
A patchwork of humanoid flesh makes up this grotesque mask stitched together with black silk or wire. It is distinctive for its bulbous orange eye- crafted from a magical glass bauble-and wide row of teeth.

When worn, the mask amplifies your ability to sense fear in other creatures.

You automatically know the value of the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} condition of any @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.1wQY3JYyhMYeeV2G]{Observed} creature, and you gain a +1 item bonus to Perception checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} frightened creatures. Whenever you deal precision damage to a frightened creature, you deal 1 additional precision damage.

If you are not evil, you are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained} 2 while wearing theSkinsaw mask.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +1 item bonus to Perception checks to Seek frightened creatures

entries.name: 缝合药膏
entries.description:
This sticky salve stubbornly holds wounds closed and encourages swift natural healing. You can activate the salve in either of the following ways.

Activate 1 Interact

Effect You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.MHLuKy4nQO2Z4Am1]{Administer First Aid} without requiring @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.s1vB3HdXjMigYAnY]{Healer's Tools}. You either gain a +2 item bonus to the Medicine check, or you can use the skinstitch salve's Medicine modifier of [[/r 1d20+13]] instead of your own.

Activate F Interact

Trigger You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1kGNdIIhuglAjIp9]{Treat Wounds} or use @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.wYerMk6F1RZb0Fwt]{Battle Medicine};

Effect You gain a +2 item bonus to the triggering Medicine check. If you roll a success on the Medicine check, you get a critical success instead.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.zlSNbMDIlTOpcO8R]{Effect: Skinstitch Salve}

entries.name: Sky Hammer
entries.description:
The sturdy, steel head of this +3 major striking @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.XszNvxnymWYRaoTp]{Flaming} @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.NVst7e69agGG9Qwd]{Shock} orichalcum warhammer is shaped like a blazing comet.

Activate R command; Trigger Your attack roll with the sky hammer is a critical success; Effect A 6th-level arcane @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.sxQZ6yqTn0czJxVd]{Fireball} spell explodes, centered on the sky hammer. The spell DC is 45. You are immune to the fireball's effect, though your allies are not.

Craft Requirements Supply a casting of fireball (6th level), and the initial raw materials must include 12,375 gp of orichalcum.

entries.name: Slates of Distant Letters
entries.description:
This matched pair of slates, roughly one handspan wide and tall, have identical ornate frames. Slates are crafted in pairs, and each works with only the other of its pair. If one slate of a pair is ever broken, the other shatters into non-magical shards. The listed price is for a pair of slates.

Activate 2 Interact;

Frequency once per hour;

Effect You use a piece of chalk to write up to 25 words on a slate. As you write, the writing also appears on the other slate in its matched pair, no matter how far away it is, as long as it is on the same plane. Wiping one slate clean erases the writing from both slates. Each slate can be activated once per hour.

entries.name: 睡眠箭 Sleep arrow
entries.description:
睡眠箭SleepArrow常常有着深蓝色或黑色的箭杆，而且箭羽格外地蓬松柔软。一支启动的睡眠箭不会造成任何伤害，但被击中的活物需要承受一个睡眠术Sleep的效果（DC17）。

制作条件：提供一次睡眠术Sleep施法。

entries.name: Sleeves of Storage
entries.description:
This loose robe has wide, voluminous sleeves that each contain an extradimensional space. These spaces each function as a bag of holding that can hold up to 5 Bulk of items (for a total of 10 Bulk), though no individual item can be of more than 1 Bulk; the sleeves grow slightly heavy as you reach maximum capacity. You can add or remove an item from a sleeve with a single hand free as an Interact action.

If a sleeve is completely empty, you can place your own familiar into that extradimensional space. It can survive comfortably in your sleeve for up to 1 hour, after which it begins to suffocate. While in your sleeve, it can't be affected or targeted by any effects, but you don't benefit from any master abilities. A familiar can exit the sleeve of its own volition with a single action that has the manipulate and move traits. You can't place any other creature into your sleeves, nor can you place your familiar in a sleeve if it's larger than Tiny. If your familiar is in your sleeve, you can't place any items in the sleeve.

entries.name: Sleeves of Storage (高等)
entries.description:
This loose robe has wide, voluminous sleeves that each contain an extradimensional space. These spaces each function as a bag of holding that can hold up to 20 Bulk of items (for a total of 40 Bulk), though no individual item can be of more than 1 Bulk; the sleeves grow slightly heavy as you reach maximum capacity. You can add or remove an item from a sleeve with a single hand free as an Interact action.

If a sleeve is completely empty, you can place your own familiar into that extradimensional space. It can survive comfortably in your sleeve for up to 4 hours, after which it begins to suffocate. While in your sleeve, it can't be affected or targeted by any effects, but you don't benefit from any master abilities. A familiar can exit the sleeve of its own volition with a single action that has the manipulate and move traits. You can't place any other creature into your sleeves, nor can you place your familiar in a sleeve if it's larger than Tiny. If your familiar is in your sleeve, you can't place any items in the sleeve.

entries.name: 滑溜符文 Slick
entries.description: 该性能让护甲变得更滑溜，如同复盖了一层油膜一样。你在逃脱（Escape）和挤压（Squeeze）的特技检定上获得+1物品加值。

entries.name: 高等滑溜符文 Slick (greater)
entries.description:
该性能让护甲变得更滑溜，如同复盖了一层油膜一样。你在逃脱（Escape）和挤压（Squeeze）的特技检定上获得+1物品加值。

类型：高等滑溜（greater）；等级：8；价格：450gp

物品加值为+2。

entries.name: 上等滑溜符文 Slick (major)
entries.description:
该性能让护甲变得更滑溜，如同复盖了一层油膜一样。你在逃脱（Escape）和挤压（Squeeze）的特技检定上获得+3物品加值。

上等：物品加值为+3。

entries.name: Slime Whip
entries.description:
This thick, greasy +1 striking shifting whip is made from a slimy pseudopod. You don't take the usual -2 circumstance penalty to your attack rolls when using the slime whip to make a lethal attack. The whip's form can be changed just like any weapon with the shifting rune, but it reverts to its original form as soon as it isn't wielded. When in its whip form, you can use the following action.

Activate 1 command, Interact;

Frequency once per hour;

Effect For 1 round, the slime whip deals acid damage rather than slashing damage. If the attack deals persistent damage, the persistent damage is also acid damage instead of its usual type.

entries.name: Sling
entries.description: Little more than a leather cup attached to a pair of straps, a sling can be used to fling smooth stones or sling bullets at a range.

entries.name: Sling Bullets
entries.description: These are small metal balls, typically either iron or lead, designed to be used as ammunition in slings.

entries.name: Slippers of Spider Climbing
entries.description:
These soft slippers are made of fine gray silk. If the slippers are left unattended for a while, they tend to attract spiders that nest inside.
Activate A command

Frequency once per hour

Effect Tiny, hairlike tendrils extend from the slippers' soles, allowing you to walk on vertical surfaces or even to move upside down along ceilings.

For 1 minute, you gain a 20-foot climb Speed and you don't need to use your hands to Climb. However, the slippers require decent traction for you to walk on a wall, so they provide no benefit when you're moving across greased, icy, or oiled surfaces.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.W3BCLbX6j1IqL0uB]{Effect: Slippers of Spider Climbing}

entries.name: Slippery Ribbon
entries.description:
Usage affixed to armor

Activation F envision

Trigger You succeed at an Acrobatics check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{Tumble Through}, but you don't have enough Speed to move all the way through the enemy's space;

Requirements You are an expert in Acrobatics.

This ribbon is constantly greasy to the touch and stains the armor it's affixed to. When you activate the slippery ribbon, your Speed increases by an amount necessary for you to move all the way through the enemy's space.

entries.name: 沉眠佳酿 Slumber wine
entries.description:
沉眠佳酿或许会在阴谋游戏中发挥最大的效用，在那里，一次缺席远比一场袭击更具毁灭性。因为沉眠佳酿而失去意识（unconscious）的角色无法在这种毒素的持续时间内被任何手段唤醒，以这种方式失去意识的角色不需要进食或饮水，并呈现出新近死亡的状态，如果检查者在一个DC40的医疗（Medicine）检定上取得成功就可以发现这名角色并未死亡。

豁免检定DC32强韧；潜伏期1小时；最大持续时间7天；

阶段1失去意识（1天）；

阶段2失去意识（2天）；

阶段3失去意识（3天）

entries.id: Small cold iron cauldron with onyx
entries.name: Small cold iron cauldron with onyx
高等发烟棒 Smokestick (greater)
entries.description:
快速地扭动这个物品，你能立即创造出一片不透明的厚重烟幕，它以你所在空间的一角为源点爆发。所有身处这块区域内的生物都视作隐蔽（concealed），并且所有其他生物对他们来说也视作隐蔽。这团烟幕持续1分钟或直到一阵强风将其吹散。

高等：烟幕的爆发半径为20尺。

entries.name: 次等发烟棒 Smokestick (lesser)
entries.description:
快速地扭动这个物品，你能立即创造出一片不透明的厚重烟幕，它以你所在空间的一角为源点爆发。所有身处这块区域内的生物都视作隐蔽（concealed），并且所有其他生物对他们来说也视作隐蔽。这团烟幕持续1分钟或直到一阵强风将其吹散。

次等：烟幕的爆发半径为5尺。

entries.name: Smoking Sword
entries.description:
Smoke constantly belches from this +1 magic longsword. Any hit with this sword deals 1 extra fire damage. You can use a special action while holding the sword to command the blade’s edges to light on fire.

Stoke Flames A (concentrate)

Until the end of your turn, the blade deals 1d6 extra fire damage instead of just 1. After you use this action, you can’t use it again for 10 minutes.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +1 fire damage, and ability to activate Stoke Flames

entries.name: 钩爪圈套
entries.description:
This snare snags a creature with its wicked metal hooks. The first creature to enter the square takes [[/r 5d8 #piercing]] piercing damage and [[/r 5d8 #slashing]] slashing damage, with a DC 27 basic Reflex save.

On a critical failure, the hooks piercing its flesh make the creature @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} until it successfully @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escapes} (DC 27).

entries.name: 蛇油 Snake oil
entries.description:
Activate A Interact

You can apply snake oil onto a wound or other outward symptom of an affliction or condition (such as sores from a disease or discoloration from a poison). For the next hour, the symptom disappears and the wounded or afflicted creature doesn't feel as if it still has the wound or affliction, though all effects remain. A creature can uncover the ruse by succeeding at a DC 17 Perception check, but only if it uses a Seek action to specifically examine the snake oil's effects.

entries.name: Snapleaf
entries.description:
Activate R Interact

Trigger You begin to fall

This small, crystalline carving takes the shape of a tree leaf and attaches to armor or clothing with a simple strap.

When you activate the snapleaf, you gain the benefits of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TTwOKGqmZeKSyNMH]{Feather Fall} and a 2nd-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{Invisibility} spell for 1 minute or until you stop falling, whichever comes first.

entries.name: Snare Kit
entries.description: This kit contains tools and materials for creating snares. A snare kit allows you to Craft snares using the Crafting skill.

entries.name: Snare Kit (Specialist)
entries.description:
This kit contains tools and materials for creating snares. A snare kit allows you to Craft snares using the Crafting skill. A specialist snare kit gives you a +1 item bonus to the check.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +1 item bonus to Crafting checks to Craft snares

entries.name: 鬼祟钥匙 Sneaky key
entries.description:
条件你在贼活Thievery中达到专家

这把银色骷髅钥匙可以被贴在盔甲或袖子上。你可以转动这把钥匙来启动它，之后1分钟内无论何时你进行的开锁PickaLock检定结果是大失败，你都能将其改为失败。

entries.name: Snowshoes
entries.description:
These specialized pieces of footwear are designed to distribute the wearer's weight over a larger area to prevent them from sinking while walking on snow. They are typically made with a wood frame and rawhide lacings that are tied over the wearer's other footwear.

While wearing snowshoes, you ignore the effects of non-magical difficult terrain caused by snow (reducing greater difficult terrain from snow to ordinary difficult terrain).

You take a -10-foot item penalty to your Speed if wearing snowshoes while walking on any surface other than snow.

entries.name: Snowshoes of the Long Trek
entries.description:
These magically enhanced snowshoes are practically a necessity when traversing the gelid tundra and snow-drenched taiga of the Saga Lands.

The snowshoes of the long trek allow their wearer to walk across ice and snow with the same surety as dry earth, ignoring the uneven ground and difficult terrain caused by ice and the difficult terrain caused by snow (reducing greater difficult terrain from ice or snow to ordinary difficult terrain).

In addition, a character wearing snowshoes of the long trek gains a +5-foot status bonus to their Speed while moving across snow or ice and is never at risk of breaking through naturally-occurring loose or soft snow.

entries.name: Soap
entries.description: Bar of soap.

entries.name: 至强胶水
entries.description:
Activate 1 minute (Interact)

This peculiar amber glue bonds two surfaces together almost inseparably. A single flask covers an area up to 1 square foot and must be used all at once to form a single bond between two surfaces. If the activation is interrupted, the bond fails and the glue is wasted. Once two surfaces are joined with sovereign glue, they can be separated only with a successful DC 50 Athletics check. The adhered objects tend to break before the glue does unless they're particularly durable, though a creature determined to separate the objects can break off the parts connected by the sovereign glue and later @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.bT3skovyLUtP22ME]{Repair} the objects.

Sovereign glue can affect creatures only if they are willing, and its bond can be harmlessly broken by carefully exfoliating the outermost layer of skin or waiting a short while for the skin to shed.

entries.name: Sovereign Steel Chunk
entries.description:
Created by Black Sovereign Kevoth-Kul, this unique alloy of cold iron and the skymetal noqual can provide protection from magical assault. The process of cold-forging the two materials together is quite complicated and precise. Characters in search of sovereign steel weapons and armor will almost assuredly have to travel to Starfall to procure gear made from this rare alloy. While some believe it possible to craft shields of sovereign steel as well, in one of his fits, Kevoth-Kul yelled that he had no use for them and banned anyone from making such a thing. So far, his smiths have been too afraid to confirm whether or not it was a joke. All sovereign steel items (including weapon and armor below) have a +4 circumstance bonus on saves against magic that the item makes, and grant their bonus to saves the owner makes specifically to protect the item from magic (such as against the rusting grasp spell).

Sovereign Steel Items

Sovereign Steel Items

Hardness

HP

High-grade 10 40 20

entries.name: Spangled Rider's Suit
entries.description:
This +1 resilient studded leather is adorned with colorful sequins that sparkle in even the faintest light.

While wearing the spangled rider's suit, you gain a +2 item bonus to Command an Animal you are riding.

Any animal you ride automatically knows the Drop Prone and Step basic actions, in addition to any other basic actions it knows (normally only Leap, Seek, Stand, Stride, and Strike).

Activate R (move)

Trigger You take damage while mounted or your mount Drops Prone

Effect You dismount, moving off your mount into a space adjacent to it.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +2 item bonus to Command an Animal you are riding

entries.name: Sparkblade
entries.description:
Faint, delicate etchings of lightning trace across the blade of this +1 cold iron shortsword. Cold iron is made from particularly pure sources of iron and shaped with little to no heat, resulting in weapons deadly to demons and fey alike.

Activate A Interact

Once per day, you can spend 1 action to point the sparkblade at a foe within 30 feet of you and shoot an arc of lightning from the blade. This lightning can leap from your chosen foe to another creature you choose within 30 feet, dealing [[/r 2d4+4]] electricity damage to each creature (DC 19 basic Reflex save).

entries.name: Spear
entries.description: A long metal shaft ending with a metal spike, a spear can be used one‑handed as a melee weapon and can be thrown.

entries.name: Spear Frog Poison
entries.description:
A single spear frog yields enough toxin to Craft 1 dose of spear frog poison.

Activate D Interact (Injury)

Saving Throw DC 15 Fortitude

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r 1d4#poison]] poison damage (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r 1d6#poison]] poison damage and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} 1 (1 round)

entries.name: Spectacles of Understanding
entries.description:
These folding, wood-framed spectacles hold flat discs of cut crystal as lenses and are held in place with thin cords that wrap around each ear, with another strap holding them around the neck while not in use. While you are wearing the spectacles, you gain a +1 item bonus to checks to Decipher Writing.

Activate A Interact;

Frequency once per day;

Effect Unfolding the spectacles onto the bridge of the nose, you gain the effects of 2nd-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vTQvfYu2llKQedmY]{Comprehend Language} for one hour except that it applies to all languages you see rather than a single language, and it does not apply to language you hear.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +1 item bonus to checks to Decipher Writing

entries.name: Spectacles of Understanding (高等)
entries.description:
These folding, wood-framed spectacles hold flat discs of cut crystal as lenses and are held in place with thin cords that wrap around each ear, with another strap holding them around the neck while not in use. While you are wearing the spectacles, you gain a +2 item bonus to checks to Decipher Writing.

Activate A Interact;

Frequency once per day;

Effect Unfolding the spectacles onto the bridge of the nose, you gain the effects of 2nd-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vTQvfYu2llKQedmY]{Comprehend Language} until you fold up the spectacles or the item is no longer invested by you, whichever comes first, except that it applies to all languages you see rather than a single language, and it does not apply to language you hear.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +2 item bonus to checks to Decipher Writing

entries.name: Spectral Nightshade
entries.description:
Activate 1 Interact;

Belladonna cultivated in planes hazardous to living visitors, such as the Shadow Plane or the Boneyard, grow with a strange, skeletal look to their branches. The leaves and berries of these extraplanar plants are partly incorporeal and significantly more toxic than belladonna grown on the Material Plane. When imbued with spirit-twisting magic, spectral nightshade quickly drains away the victim's vitality and makes colors painfully bright and bewildering. Spectral nightshade doesn't affect creatures that have no spirit; if a possessing spirit inhabits a body that takes poison damage from spectral nightshade, the possessor takes an equal amount of force damage, even if the possessor can't be affected directly by poisons.

Saving Throw DC 33 Fortitude;

Onset 1 minute;

Maximum Duration 6 minutes;

Stage 1 [[/r 10d6 #poison]] poison damage and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled}(1 minute);

Stage 2 [[/r 13d6 #poison]] poison damage and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained} 1 (1 minute);

Stage 3 [[/r 15d6 #poison]] poison damage, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused}, and drained 2 (1 minute)

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.PHVHBbdHeQRfjLmE]{Spirit Blast}.

entries.name: Speed
entries.description: Attacks with a speed weapon are supernaturally swift. While wielding a speed weapon, you gain the quickened condition, but you can use the additional action granted only to make a Strike with the etched weapon.

entries.name: Spell-Eating Pitch
entries.description:
Activate 2 Interact;

This gummy resin contains sparkling motes of magical energy that dramatically impair your cognitive functions and dispel spells as you cast them. Spell energy manifests but then sputters out, as though drained away by the sparkling motes. While you're @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied} by this poison, the DC of flat checks to avoid disruption from the stupefied condition when you Cast a Spell is 5 + twice the stupefied value, rather than 5 + the stupefied value.

Saving Throw DC 31 Fortitude;

Maximum Duration 6 rounds;

Stage 1 [[/r 5d6 #poison]] poison damage and stupefied 1 (1 round);

Stage 2 [[/r 6d6 #poison]] poison damage and stupefied 3 (1 round);

Stage 3 [[/r 7d6 #poison]] poison damage and stupefied 4 (1 round)

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of 6th-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic}.

entries.name: Spell-Storing
entries.description:
A spell-storing rune creates a reservoir of eldritch energy within the etched weapon. A spellcaster can spend 1 minute to cast a spell of 3rd level or lower into the weapon. The spell must have a casting of 2 actions or fewer and must be able to target a creature other than the caster. The spell has no immediate effect-it is instead stored for later. When you wield a spell-storing weapon, you immediately know the name and level of the stored spell. A spell-storing weapon found as treasure has a 50% chance of having a spell of the GM's choice stored in it.

Activate A command; Requirements On your previous action this turn, you hit and damaged a creature with this weapon; Effect You unleash the stored spell, which uses the target of the triggering attack as the target of the spell. This empties the spell from the weapon and allows a spell to be cast into it again. If the spell requires a spell attack roll, the result of your attack roll with the weapon determines the degree of success of the spell, and if the spell requires a saving throw, the DC is 30.

Activate A command; Effect Harmlessly expend the stored spell. This frees the weapon to have a new spell cast into it.

entries.name: Spellbook (Blank)
entries.description: A spellbook holds the written knowledge necessary to learn and prepare various spells, a necessity for wizards (who typically get one for free) and a useful luxury for other spellcasters looking to learn additional spells. Each spellbook can hold up to 100 spells. The Price listed is for a blank spellbook.

entries.name: Spellguard Blade
entries.description:
The guard of this +1 striking main-gauche is inscribed with eldritch glyphs that guard against magic.

When you are benefiting from the +1 circumstance bonus to AC from this weapon's parry trait, you also apply that circumstance bonus to your saving throws against spells that target you.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.zqKzWGLODgIvtiKf]{Effect: Spellguard Blade}

entries.name: 护法盾 Spellguard Shield
entries.description: 这面盾牌上的奥术符印可以抵抗魔法。当你举起这面铁盾（硬度6，HP24，BT12）时，其给与AC的环境加值同样作为环境加值添加到你对抗法术的豁免骰上。

entries.name: Spellstrike Ammunition (Type I)
entries.description:
Mystic patterns create a magic reservoir within this ammunition. You activate spellstrike ammunition by Casting a Spell into the ammunition. The spell must be of a spell level the ammunition can hold, and the spell must be able to target a creature other than the caster. A creature hit by activated spellstrike ammunition is targeted by the spell. If the creature isn't a valid target for the spell, the spell is lost.

The ammunition affects only the target hit, even if the spell would normally affect more than one target. If the spell requires a spell attack roll, use the result of your ranged attack roll with the ammunition to determine the degree of success of the spell. If the spell requires a saving throw, the target attempts the save against your spell DC.

The maximum level of spell the ammunition can hold determines its item level and Price.

Activate D Cast a Spell

Maximum Spell Level 1st

entries.description:

Activate D Cast a Spell

Maximum Spell Level 2nd

Activate D Cast a Spell

Maximum Spell Level 8th

entries.name: Sphere of Annihilation
entries.description:
A sphere of annihilation is a floating black sphere that pulls any matter that comes into contact with it into a void, destroying it utterly. Anything or anyone destroyed by the sphere can be brought back only by a deity's direct intervention. The sphere can't be counteracted by dispel magic or similar effects.

The sphere stays entirely still until caused to move by a creature controlling it. Taking control of the sphere requires succeeding at an attempt to activate it. A talisman of the sphere makes it easier to control the sphere.

Activate A command; Requirements You are within 40 feet of the sphere; Effect You attempt a DC 30 Arcana or Occultism check to take control of the sphere. If someone else already controls the sphere, this check uses their Will DC if higher. If you succeed, you take control of the sphere. If you fail, the sphere moves 10 feet closer to you (or 20 feet on a critical failure). You keep control as long as you remain within 80 feet of the sphere and Sustain the Activation each round. When you Sustain the Activation, you must attempt a DC 30 Arcana or Occultism check. If you succeed, you direct the sphere to move up to 10 feet in a straight line (or up to 20 feet on a critical success). On a failure, you lose control of the sphere, and it moves 10 feet closer to you in a straight line (or 20 feet on a critical failure).

Destruction When a gate spell is cast such that its rift overlaps a sphere of annihilation, roll d%. On a result of 1-50, the sphere is destroyed; on a 51-85, the spell is disrupted; and on a 86-100, everything within an 180-foot emanation of the sphere is pulled to another plane through a tear in the spatial fabric. If a rod of cancellation (Pathfinder Advanced Player's Guide) touches the sphere, both items explode, dealing 14d6 bludgeoning damage (DC 35 basic Reflex save) to everything in a 60-foot burst from the point of their destruction.

entries.name: 蜘丝根
entries.description:
A paste made by mashing the fine, threadlike roots of a certain creeper vine, spider root renders a victim clumsy and maladroit.

Activate A Interact (Contact)

Saving Throw DC 28 Fortitude

Onset 1 minute

Maximum Duration 6 minutes

Stage 1 [[/r 8d6#poison]] poison damage and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy} 1 (1 minute)

Stage 2 [[/r 9d6#poison]] poison damage and clumsy 2 (1 minute)

Stage 3 [[/r 10d6#poison]] poison damage and clumsy 3 (1 minute)

entries.name: 尖刺圈套 Spike snare
entries.description: This basic snare consists of hidden spikes that rely on a creature's momentum to lacerate or potentially impale it as it enters the snare's square, dealing 2d8 piercing damage. The creature must attempt a DC 17 basic Reflex saving throw.

entries.name: Spiked Chain
entries.description: This 4‑foot‑long length of chain is covered with barbs and has spikes on one or both ends. Some feature metal hoops used as handgrips.

entries.name: Spiked Gauntlet
entries.description: Providing the same defensive function as a standard gauntlet, this version has a group of spikes protruding from the knuckles to deliver piercing damage with a punch.

entries.name: 尖刺盾 Spined shield
entries.description:
五根锯齿尖刺从铁盾（硬度6，HP24，BT12）面伸出展开保护。尖刺作为+1强击盾刺使用。当你用该盾做出盾牌格挡反应动作时，尖刺会先于盾牌受到伤害。盾牌受到伤害时（应用硬度后），每根尖刺都能承受6点伤害，以减少6点对盾牌本体的伤害。在此之后盾牌本体才会受到剩下的伤害。若无尖刺参与，盾牌正常受到伤害。当所有尖刺消耗后，直到下一天尖刺复原为止，你失去用尖刺攻击的能力。

启动：[A]交互；

效果：你用一根尖刺射击一个目标。射击出的尖刺使用尖刺数据，作为射程增量120尺的军用远程武器使用。

entries.name: Spiritsight Crossbow
entries.description:
This +1 striking @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Ghost Touch} crossbow has an array of crystalline lenses and silver fittings along the stock and feels strangely light.

Activate 1 envision;

Frequency once per minute;

Effect You aim through the crossbow's crystalline lenses, gaining imprecise vision onto the Ethereal Plane with a range of 60 feet in addition to your normal senses for the rest of your turn. While this effect lasts, your next Strike with the spiritsight crossbow can also affect targets on the Ethereal Plane during the first 60 feet of its flight.

entries.name: 板条甲 Splint mail
entries.description: This type of armor is chain mail reinforced with flexible, interlocking metal plates, typically located on the wearer's torso, upper arms, and legs. A suit of this armor comes with an undercoat of padded armor (see above) and a pair of gauntlets (page 285).

entries.name: Spore Sap
entries.description:
This flexible +2 striking sap is crafted from the stalks of cave fungi and bound around a mesh of spore-infused gills. Demon-worshipping xulgaths use spore saps to capture spellcasters alive for later sacrifice.

Activate R Interact (poison); Frequency three times per day; Trigger You successfully Strike a creature with the spore sap; Effect The spore sap releases a puff of stupefying fungal spores. The target must succeed at a DC 28 Fortitude save or become stupefied 1 for 1 minute (stupefied 2 on a critical failure).

entries.name: Spyglass
entries.description: A typical spyglass lets you see eight times farther than normal.

entries.name: Spyglass (Fine)
entries.description:
A typical spyglass lets you see eight times farther than normal. A fine spyglass adds a +1 item bonus to Perception checks to notice details at a distance.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +1 item bonus to Perception checks to notice details at a distance

entries.name: Staff
entries.description: This long piece of wood can aid in walking and deliver a mighty blow.

entries.name: 防护法杖 Staff of abjuration
entries.description:
这把雕刻精美的木杖握上去十分温暖，手心仿佛感受到跃动的能量。持握该法杖时，你在鉴别防护系法术的检定上获得+2环境加值。

启动：施放法术；效果：你消耗一定充能从法杖法术列表中施放法术。

·戏法：护盾术shield

·1环：魔法警报alarm,羽落术featherfall

·2环：解除魔法dispelmagic,忍受环境endureelements,抵抗能量伤害resistenergy

entries.name: Staff of Abjuration (高等)
entries.description:
This intricately carved wooden staff is warm to the touch and thrums with inner energy. While wielding the staff, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to identify abjuration magic.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TVKNbcgTee19PXZR]{Shield}
  • 1st @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4WAib3GichxLjp5p]{Alarm}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TTwOKGqmZeKSyNMH]{Feather Fall}
  • 2nd @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.5esP2GVzvxWsMgaX]{Endure Elements}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Fr58LDSrbndgld9n]{Resist Energy}

entries.name: 火焰法杖 Staff of fire
entries.description:
这根法杖就像底部烧黑的烧火棍，凑近点能闻到会像余烬一样淡淡的煤烟味。你可用交互动作使用法杖头接触火炬、火种或易燃物来点燃目标。

启动：施放法术；效果：你消耗一定充能从法杖法术列表中施放法术。

类型：火焰法杖；等级：3；价格：60gp

·戏法：燃火术produceflame

·1环：燃烧之手burninghands

制造需求：为列表上所有法术提供1次对应环级的施法。

entries.name: 治疗法杖 Staff of Healing
entries.description:
用光洁的白木制作，这根法杖两段各有一个金色十字架，上面装饰有许多红宝石。当你使用自己的法术位或法杖充能施放治疗术（heal）时，你将治疗法杖的物品加值添加到治疗术恢复的HP上。

启动：施放法术；效果：你消耗一定充能从法杖法术列表中施放法术。

类型：治疗法杖；等级：4；价格：90gp

给治疗术的物品加值为+1。

·戏法：稳定术tabilize

·1环：治疗术heal

制造需求：为列表上所有法术提供1次对应环级的施法。

类型：上等治疗法杖；等级：12；价格：1800gp

给治疗术的物品加值为+3。

·4环：治疗术heal,复原术restoration

·5环：生命之息breathoflife,治疗术heal,移除疾病removedisease

制造需求：为列表上所有法术提供1次对应环级的施法。

entries.name: Staff of Healing (真实)
entries.description:
Made of smooth, white wood, this staff is capped at each end with a golden cross adorned with a multitude of ruby cabochons. A staff of healing grants an item bonus to the Hit Points you restore anytime you cast the heal spell using your own spell slots or using charges from the staff.

Activate Cast a Spell; Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.

The item bonus granted to heal spells is +3.

  • Cantrip @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.SnjhtQYexDtNDdEg]{Stabilize}
  • 1st @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal}
  • 2nd @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.SnaLVgxZ9ryUFmUr]{Restoration} @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Et8RSCLx8w7uOLvo]{Restore Senses}
  • 3rd @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.RneiyehRO6f7LP44]{Remove Disease}
  • 4th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.SnaLVgxZ9ryUFmUr]{Restoration}
  • 5th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Hnc7eGi7vyZenAIm]{Breath of Life}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.RneiyehRO6f7LP44]{Remove Disease}
  • 6th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.SnaLVgxZ9ryUFmUr]{Restoration} @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Et8RSCLx8w7uOLvo]{Restore Senses}
  • 7th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.2Vkd1IxylPceUAAF]{Regenerate} @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.RneiyehRO6f7LP44]{Remove Disease}

entries.name: Staff of Illumination
entries.description:
This simple iron staff is capped with a faceted, clear gem.

Activate Interact; Effect The gem at the top of the staff glows as a torch, shedding bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light to the next 20 feet) for 10 minutes.

Activate Cast a Spell; Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.WBmvzNDfpwka3qT4]{Light}
  • 2nd @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.ynm8JIU3sc3qUMpa]{Continual Flame}
  • 3rd @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.ynm8JIU3sc3qUMpa]{Continual Flame}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.DyiD239dNS7RIxZE]{Searing Light}


Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.

entries.name: 幻术法杖 Staff of illusion
entries.description:
这根精心设计的金属法杖上镶嵌着珍贵的黄金。当你从法杖施法时，你需要的幻象会从法杖表面浮现。持握它时，你在鉴别幻术系法术的检定上获得+2环境加值。

启动：施放法术；效果：你消耗一定充能从法杖法术列表中施放法术。

·1环：虚假伪装illusorydisguise,虚假物体illusoryobject

·2环：虚假生物illusorycreature,物品伪装itemfacade,腹语术ventriloquism

entries.name: Staff of Illusion (高等)
entries.description:
This staff is tapered at the base and carved into a gem-studded twist at the top. While wielding the staff, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to identify evocation magic.

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

entries.name: Staff of Impossible Visions
entries.description:
This bizarre staff is made from oak, capped with a cluster of eye-shaped gemstones that seem to move and undulate at the corner of your vision. While wielding the staff, you can peer through the eyes, using your normal visual senses (including any benefits of spells affecting your vision, like see invisibility). You can maneuver the staff to see things around corners, at higher elevations, or in places where the staff can fit but your head can't. This doesn't provide sufficient line of effect to target creatures around corners. The eyes are as vulnerable as your eyes and can be affected by anything that alters your vision, such as a blinding flash of light.

Activate Cast a Spell;

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.

  • Cantrip @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4gBIw4IDrSfFHik4]{Daze}
  • 1st @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4koZzrnMXhhosn0D]{Fear}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.R8bqnYiThB6MYTxD]{Phantom Pain}
  • 2nd @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.41TZEjhO6D1nWw2X]{Augury}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Mkbq9xlAUxHUHyR2]{Paranoia}

entries.name: Staff of Power
entries.description:
This staff of magically hardened wood is topped with a silver sculpture depicting magical runic symbols. When used as a weapon, a staff of power is a +2 greater striking staff.

Voluntarily destroying a staff of power unleashes an incredible blast of energy. When wielding the staff, you can Interact to break it. This releases a 30-foot-burst magical explosion centered on the staff. This deals [[/r 2d8]] force damage per charge remaining in the staff (DC 40 basic Reflex save). You automatically critically fail your save. A creature reduced to 0 Hit Points by this damage dies instantly; this is a death effect.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

entries.name: Staff of Providence
entries.description:
A large, stylized symbol of an eye adorns the top of this wooden staff, representing the watchful eye of the divine powers. The bearer of the staff can guide and protect, seeing bounties and tragedies that could befall them in the future.

When wielding this staff, you gain a +1 item bonus on Survival checks to Sense Direction or Subsist, and to Religion checks to Recall Knowledge.

Activate Cast a Spell;

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

entries.name: Staff of the Magi
entries.description:
Sigils and runes of ancient and powerful magic cover the iron cladding on this long wooden staff. A staff of the magi is a +3 major striking staff, and when wielding it you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against spells.

Voluntarily destroying a staff of the magi unleashes a truly devastating wave of arcane energy that surges out, dissipating with distance. When wielding the staff, you can break it using an Interact action. This releases a 30-foot-burst magical explosion centered on the staff. This deals [[/r 2d10]] force damage per charge remaining in the staff (DC 40 basic Reflex save), You automatically critically fail your save. The explosion continues to echo beyond the initial blast zone, dealing half as much damage to creatures beyond 30 feet but within a 60-foot burst. A creature reduced to 0 Hit Points by this damage dies instantly; this is a death effect.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • 6th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.r7ihOgKv19eJQnik]{Disintegrate}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.sxQZ6yqTn0czJxVd]{Fireball}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9AAkVUCwF6WVNNY2]{Lightning Bolt}
  • 7th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.3puDanGfpEt6jK5k]{Cone of Cold}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.115Xp9E38CJENhNS]{Passwall}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.5bTt2CvYHPvaR7QQ]{Plane Shift}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IarZrgCeaiUqOuRu]{Wall of Fire}
  • 8th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.sxQZ6yqTn0czJxVd]{Fireball}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.aAbfKn8maGjJjk2W]{Mage Armor}
  • 9th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.jrBa9deU2ULFWvSl]{Meteor Swarm}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.kghwmH3tQjMIhdH1]{Summon Dragon}

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.

Automatically applied effects:

+1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against spells

entries.name: 变化法杖 Staff of transmutation
entries.description:
在这个细金属法杖头部有一个玻璃球，里面不断翻滚着细沙。持握它时，你在鉴别变化系法术的检定上获得+2环境加值。

启动：施放法术；效果：你消耗一定充能从法杖法术列表中施放法术。

·戏法：印记术sigil

·1环：行军步fleetstep,跳跃术jump

·2环：变巨术enlarge,类人形态humanoidform

entries.name: Staff of Transmutation (高等)
entries.description:
A glass orb atop this metal staff contains fine, undulating sand. While wielding the staff, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to identify transmutation magic.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.AUctDF2fqPZN2w4W]{Sigil}
  • 1st @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.aEM2cttJ2eYcLssW]{Fleet Step}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Q7QQ91vQtyi1Ux36]{Jump}
  • 2nd @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.2qGqa33E4GPUCbMV]{Humanoid Form}
  • 3rd @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.RvBlSIJmxiqfCpR9]{Feet to Fins}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Q7QQ91vQtyi1Ux36]{Jump}
  • 4th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.V8wXOsoejQhe6CyG]{Gaseous Form}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.McnPlLFvKtQVXNcG]{Shape Stone}

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +2 circumstance bonus to checks to identify transmutation magic

entries.description:
A glass orb atop this metal staff contains fine, undulating sand. While wielding the staff, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to identify transmutation magic.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.
